Any other place I've purchased this ( Walgreens , Walmart, Target etc) it has always been white with maybe a slight creamy yellowish tint with a faint coconut smell. This jar I purchased from Amazon is clearly very yellow , chunky blobs even though it has all turned liquid and has no smell at all. It worries me that this jar of Shea moisture is either counterfeit or it's going bad.

Review: I am African American and love supporting black business. I love buying products that are cruelty free to animals. This product is vegan. I was concerned after reading the reviews about the jar leaking in the box before it was delivered to customer's address. When I received my package, it was almost getting ready to leak through the box. Luckly my package arrived in less than two days. The company should wrap this product in bubble wrap in the future, to stop it from leaking on other items in the box. I was lucky that I dodged a bullet on that too. The coconut was white and creamy. The scent smelled good just like shea butter. It has been two weeks and my skin is so soft and moist. I will be buying this product again in the near future.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a high-quality coconut oil. No cheap additives, no unhealthy stuff mixed in with it.I have been using coconut oil on my hair for years. It works better than anything else I have tried.  It can quickly turn "bad hair" into beautiful hair.I also  use coconut oil for baking.I think for most people, this product is fine for their hair. There's a catch with using coconut oil on my hair. Because my hair is so thick, using coconut oil that is solid at room temperature doesn't work well for me. I can't work it down to the roots and I get little bits sticking to my hair. So I use a premium liquid version; I keep the bottle in the bathroom for that purpose. Cooking is always with the solid at room temperature version.And rather than use toxic shaving cream (most shaving creams contain toxins that you absorb through your skin), I use coconut oil. You don't get the big lather, which to me is a plus because I can then see what I am doing. You do get great lubrication while moisturizing your skin and any oil that stays on the blade helps it last longer by protecting it from corrosion.Since this product is 100% extra virgin coconut oil, you can eat it. That means it's perfectly safe for your hair and scalp and if your hair isn't conducive to using this form of the oil you can use it in the kitchen for many different kinds of cooking needs. Coconut oil has a smoke point of 350 degrees F, so it's not quite appropriate for popcorn (use peanut oil, which has a smoke point of 450 degrees F).In addition to being non-toxic, coconut oil has many health benefits. Some people believe they should avoid it, under the theory a low-fat diet is good for your health. In fact, a low-fat diet is harmful to your brain. Men on low-fat diets have low testosterone, and anyone on a low-fat diet runs a much higher risk of neurological disease. Yes, too much fat is bad but don't fear using coconut oil. I use it regularly, and also consume organic butter, whole eggs, avocados, and nuts regularly; yet my body fat is below the 5% threshold required for a body fat scale to read it and I have not been sick since 1971.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: Far more expensive because it's "beauty" instead of kitchen coconut oil
Review: This is literally the same stuff as 100% extra virgin coconut oil that you get for about 1/4  the price. Heck, you can get organic 100% extra virgin oil for slightly over half the price. There is nothing in this except for coconut oil, but the only difference is that there's no mention of culinary uses on the label.  Pro tip: You can use any coconut oil for either beauty or culinary use.  100% extra virgin is the second-nicest kind; the best is 100% organic extra virgin.So it's hard to know how to rate this. As coconut oil, it's fine. Works well on skin, hair (in small quantities), chapped lips, rough feet, and in stir fries, baking, and sauteing.  The product is the same as every other extra-virgin coconut oil I've seen.  But unless you want to spend at least $15 for nothing except for the beauty-specific label on the bottle, I'd buy a different brand.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The one ingredient in this product is coconut oil. It contains no phthalates, parabens, mineral oils, or sulfates. This makes it ideal for those trying to avoid unnecessary chemicals in skincare products. It’s also cruelty-free. The label states it is extra virgin coconut oil, but there is no extra virgin grade for coconut oil in the US. Virgin grade coconut oil means the oil is unrefined.I have used this oil on my face and especially my heels which tend to become rough and cracked in cold weather. After a few days of use at night, my skin is more smooth and supple. I have also found it very effective as a makeup remover, particularly for the delicate eye area. When applying the oil at night I put a small amount (less than ½ teaspoon) and rub it in my hands to soften it. (In the jar, it has the consistency of butter.) Then I gently smooth it over my face and neck. My heels get some too before I put on socks.At first, the formula leaves a greasy finish on the skin. This gradually goes away. This is the only negative I have found with the product. In the morning, my skin is smooth without any oily residue. I like that coconut oil is naturally antibacterial and antifungal. Best of all, I don’t need a separate makeup remover and night cream, since it does the job of both without adding a buildup of harmful chemicals. The product scores a (1) on the EWG skin deep website. Because it is so greasy, it probably wouldn’t be advisable to use it on oily skin.There are conflicting opinions on its effects as a treatment before shampooing. especially on coarse or dry hair. Some people warn it can increase brittleness. Others say it can be used to increase softness and shine and prevent fly-aways. I have not tried the product on my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have fairly chronic dry skin.  I was previously using various other oils and moisturizer creams which work for a while but not throughout the day.  I've never tried a coconut oil based product before, and was curious to see how it would work.It is pure coconut oil.  Solid at room temperature, liquid at body temperature.  The texture is a bit grainy at first but once it melts it goes on smoothy.  It has a pleasing coconut scent.  Once applied the skin feels a bit oily but not excessively so.Because it's solid at room temperature it can be hard to get out of the container.  I've found that the trick is to apply enough pressure with the fingertips to scrape some off the surface which helps get enough onto my fingers to apply with relative ease.  A little goes a long way!When the product arrived it had settled into one side of the jar like it had melted in transit.  I re-melted it with warm water to resettle it after which it seemed perfectly fine.All in all I'm relatively pleased with this product.  Seems to be very high quality, and as a moisturizer it works well enough and is inexpensive enough compared to what I've been using that I will likely continue purchasing it in the future.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This has a strong coconut scent to it and if that bothers you then keep looking. This is solid most of the time in the jar and will melt in your hand due to your body temperature. If it is above 75 in your house this will start to soften up in the jar but still remain in a solid form, any hotter and this will melt to a liquid form.I use this daily after my shower/bath and have found that it does leave my skin soft and moisturized - if you use too much it will look oily on your skin.  A little truly goes a long ways!There are no toxic additives or scents or colors added - this makes it perfect for those with allergies.This is produced by a well known company who help empower women!

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I was a bit confused that this was just Coconut Oil because from the product brand "SheaMoisture" I thought it was a mix with Shea butter. I was wrong - so clearing that up in case anyone else thinks the same. That said, the product looks and feels high quality. I use coconut oil for both cooking and beauty, so have tried tons of brands. This smells nice when you open it, which does not happen with some of the coconut oils I've used. It feels nice, melting quickly in my hands and spreading easily on my skin. The company promotes helping women and overall it has a good vibe, so if that's important to you, you get that extra sense of helping the world with this product. It is more expensive than some coconut oils, but I'm not sure if that's due to quality (which is high) or the company using funds to lift women. Overall, I'm happy with it and will use it as a gift to my skin and hair and to remove my eye makeup. Love it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I use coconut oil for almost everything. I use it for cooking, haircare, skincare, dental care and keeping hair dye off my skin during treatments. This coconut oil works great for all of my skin/hair care needs and the jar looks great. The size of the container is perfect for my bathroom sink. It is paraben, phthalate, mineral oil, and sulfate-free. It also wasn't tested on animals. I love this brand and how much care they take to put out a quality product with minimal effects on our world. This is a company I can feel good giving my money to and I'd highly recommend it!

Review: I used this product with my first daughter and I’m using it again 4 years later. Currently 36 weeks pregnant and still free and clear of stretch marks! Just rub on belly every night before bed.

Title: Bought multiple times
Review: I have ordered this product more than once. I legit use it from head to toe. Just wanted to make sure as I feel like some people are surprised but if the weather is warm and it forms a liquid and if it is cooler than it is a salad.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count

Review: I apply on my hair two hours before to wash it. I love it, my hair is moisturized and soft

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: the product arrived hardened in the container, must be old stock
Review: I didn't open the container until I needed it. upon opening I noticed that it was hardened in the container. It must be old stock. I can't return the item because it is beyond the return policy. I wish that I had checked it upon arrival.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: Has no smell
Review: This has no smell to me, which is good because I like to split it up into little containers and mix different fragrance oils in it. It works good as a moisturizer but a little goes a long way.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Extra Virgin Coconut Oil Moisturizer and Leave-In Conditioner for Head-to-Toe Pampering Nourishing Hydration Skin and Hair Care with No Sulfates 2 Count
Title: Best hair
Review: Love the way it makes me hair feels n grows

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: great quality
Review: I love this. I have long curly hair and I only have to  use a small amount to style. 5 stars..

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Great product
Review: Really holds my hair but doesn’t leave it hard and dry.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: It is suppose to be alcohol free. And it has a isopropal in it  so it does have alcohol
Review: I ordered this product and it was suppose to be alcohol free. It has a isopropal in it.. That is alcohol. I'm very allergic to it and it drives me crazy at all the itching.. And I don't have dandruff.. But its embarrassing how bad it makes me itch. Liz Brewton

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Worth it
Review: My favorite gel to use for my curly haired toddler

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: The only product that keeps my curls in tack
Review: When I use this product it really works with my texture of hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Not for sensory sensitivity scent wise
Review: I didnt break the seal and i can smell this. It can be smelled with the cap on. Way way to heavy smelling and i could never have this on my hair. Its a shame so many products are so heavy with scents. It makes it hard to find things.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Inexpensive Holy Grail
Review: I absolutely love this gel. I'm really upset that I can't find it in CVS or Ulta anymore. I hope Sheamoisture doesn't stop making this because it's the only hair gel that defines my curls so nicely. I first cowash my hair, squeeze out the extra water, then apply the gel. It's amazing! I sometimes like to use it with Sheamoisture Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Leave-In Milk.Info about me: 4a, fine strands, low density, high porosity.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: No alcohol
Review: I like that it contains no alcohol which other products have and they make my hair “ hard and crunchy “

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Not the same product I'm used to
Review: I'm a huge fan of this product normally and purchase it all the time. Can't find it in stores anymore so I got it on Amazon. I could smell this stuff before I even open to the Box. Ended up just giving it away to someone.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: DON’T BUY
Review: I literally never write reviews, but I have to warn you guys! This is NOT the same product that is sold in stores. I’ve been using this for years. I love it. I bought this off Amazon because I could no longer find it in stores. The texture is different. It’s a little more runny. The smell is also different. This product breaks out my scalp and dries out my hair!!THIS IS A FAKE!!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: No crunchy hair feeling
Review: My curly hair loves it without that crunchy gel feel

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Hair hydrogenation
Review: It has a fantastic smell of coconut and I use it daily.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Great product and price .
Review: Love how my hair feels.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: Not good on curly hair👎🏻

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Rock hard hold
Review: It makes your hair pretty rock hard. I don't like a rock hard hold from gel

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: My hair can't live without this
Review: I've spent my whole life trying to find the perfect product for my fine curly (frizzy) hair that doesn't make it stiff or look greasy. This is it!I use the gel/cream on my damp hair after washing, and set it in curlers to air dry. My hair comes out soft an wavy. I use some on the dry hair to cut down on frizz and to keep the curls in place. My hair can still move, but doesn't get crazy. I can walk around outside with my hair down without it turning into a rat's nest.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Styling Gel 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Hydrating, Alcohol-Free Hair Gel 8 oz
Title: Dissatisfied
Review: Made my hair feel weighed down and hard to brush

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Works well on fine straight hair.
Review: Im a fine, straight haired girl who much like my CG sisters has stepped away from products with silicone in it due to how greasy and flat it makes my hair.The answer to that was Shea Moisture 100% Coconut Oil leave in.  No silicones, full of great ingredients that condition and feed the hair without weighing it down.I spray a couple pumps on my palms then work thru from mid shaft to ends. Leaves a lasting beautiful scent (that hummingbirds seem to like as one would not leave me alone while sitting outside reading a book), lightly softens and releases some tangles for easy combing.Thank you Shea Moisture for making such wonderful products!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great leave in conditioner! I’m happy I got it!
Review: I used this product for the first time after my shower this afternoon and wow! I’m impressed, it left my hair smelling wonderful(light coconut/clean smell) and it made my hair super soft and manageable. I am very happy with my purchase & recommend!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Soft.
Review: Hair type: high porosity, 2C/3APros: smells good, controlled frizz, made hair super soft, very defined, smooth, manageable.Cons: to thick for a spray, Fragrance is way to high in the list making it a very concentrated smell and taking up majority of the percentages for being on top. Other ingredients Should be.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: AMAZING and affordable
Review: I normally have frizzy hair but this product left my hair feeling so soft and smooth.... I have never found an affordable product that could do that. I will definitely be stocking up on this.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Excellent High Porosity Product
Review: Excellent product. My hair looks healthy and shiny.  This item controls my high porosity hair very well. I look like a different person with tamed hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: I wanted to like this product
Review: I've used other products from the same brand and loved them.  I was really hopeful this product would be able to replace my other detangler/leave-in-conditioner.  Unfortunately it doesn't seem to provide much extra moisture and my hair is not very soft after air drying.  The smell is great though.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love it!
Review: I want to thank TJMaxx for having this product but then I couldn't find it there. I have found it at the pharmacy but it is better priced here. It detangles hair almost immediately! I have think wavy hair so it can get a crazy knot over a couple of days! It also smells great! Highly recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Definitely a fan!
Review: This works really well. I use it on my sons’ hair. One has a skin fade and the other has 2 inches of hair with a skin fade. They both had flakiness before we started using this. This moisturizes really well.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells soooo good! (detangles long, thin hair)
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   The scent of this is incredible!  My boyfriend commented on it right away.  It is a light fresh coconut smell.  (Don’t worry, it does NOT smell like sun tan lotion.)  I have long, thin hair, and I bought this to hopefully strengthen my hair and prevent more breakage.  I was surprised how well this detangled my hair.  It was so much easier to comb after washing.  I’ve also been using this to finish my hair after blow-drying...I just spray some in my hands and run a small amount over my dry hair.  It makes my hair super soft!  See video for how it sprays out of the bottle.  It comes out a bit inconsistently, and it’s not a super fine mist.  I recommend only spraying it directly on wet hair.  For dry hair, spray it in your hands to apply.  I’m loving this product so far and will buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Misleading product information .....
Review: First the ingredients of package and this listing for the product do not match up.  The listing shows on Amazon shows "FRAGRANCE" toward the bottom of the ingredient list.  Look on the bottle and it is actually at the top of the ingredient list, meaning there is more of that ingredient. Not to mention, the product came in a shipping box, no lid, cap or shrink wrap.  The pic shows exactly how it came.  Plus the plump was already primed, spaying with one pump, proving to me that it was a return.  Anything you buy with a sprayer or pump usually you have to try pressing the pump a few times before product will spray, coming like they from factory.I was going update once I use it on my daughter's hair but now I am very reluctant to use on my daughter's hair.  I have noticed sofar that the product is thick but thin enough to spray without an issue. Also the smell is phenomenal although strong.IDK what to think.  Seems like a legit brand, Just difficult supplier(?)

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Knock off
Review: Do not buy this product it is a knock off. I’ve gone to Ulta many times and never has it had the consistency of lotion. And it smells of chemicals. Whoever is the selling this needs to get banned.  Who knows what I was putting in my hair

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Completely saved my hair
Review: Absolutely amazing product. Liked it so much I purchased again when I ran out. I have colored and lightened my hair sooo many times and the last time I went blonde I really needed to find a good leave in that would help restore my hair. I’ve used several leave in products before and most will weigh down my hair or leave it looking too shiny. Amazing scent, and a little goes a long way. I also have hair that tangles very easily and this + a wet brush and my hair is smooth and tangle free in less than a minute. I am also a cosmetologist so you can take my review seriously. Good for the price and I’ve seen my hair go from looking terrible at the ends to smooth and beautiful. My new favorite product and I would highly recommend if you have damaged hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: No matter what it's for your hair type.
Review: If your a foster parent and you never know what life is gonna give you next this is a just have!!!!!This has become everyone in our house go to hair product. From baby fine hair to more thick and course AND EVERYTHING IN BETWEEN.❤💛💙💜💚LOVE THIS PRODUCT

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Packaging needs work
Review: The product itself is great; however, the packing of the product deserves zero stars. Some of the product was wasted outside of the bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have thin 2b-ish hair, and I needed a lightweight leave in. This was well recommended, so I gave it a go. It seems like the formula is nice and helped keep my hair moisturized between washes, but the smell set off my allergies and migraines so badly. I have other products in this exact same coconut line from shea moisture- the shampoo and conditioners are my default products, and they don't bother my nose at all. I suspect this has either a lot more of the same fragrance, or something else in the formula adds to it. It is super, super strong, and it lasts forever on my hair, I had to get rid of it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Good leave in treatment
Review: I spray in my hands and put through my hair otherwise I feel it makes my hair to oily in places. I don't know might just be my hair. I have super fine, dry and thin hair. With my health issues my hair struggles to be healthy. I feel using this the last couple months has helped my hair. I may look it more products by this brand.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Saved my bleached hair!!!
Review: I love this product!!! This has made my highlighted bleached hair feel and look so soft. My hair is very dry due to bleaching but after using this leave in treatment my hair is back to normal! I cant reccomend this enough!!!! This is perfect for dry damaged hair!!! I'm so happy I found this, it has made a huge difference in my hair..it also smells very nice! Please never discontinue this product it's the best!!!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Pretty sure this is a knock off
Review: The bottle to the left is store bought and the bottle on the right is the one I purchased here. As soon as I grabbed it I noticed the difference in the color of the liquid and even size of the bottle. As you can see in the picture even the font and design is different. When I opened the bottle even the texture was wayyyyy too water and it didn’t have a scent at all. Very disappointed.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Good but not for all hair types
Review: It says it’s for all hair types, I have 4c hair that has high porosity, so my hair soaked this stuff up quickly and still felt dry. I applied multiple times and it’s decent. It has the consistency of watery lotion, so if you have naturally curly hair, this stuff will make your hair revert back to its natural state as if you put water in your hair. It smells good at least and is lightweight but if you have type 4 hair, I’d say this stuff is pretty weak.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Finally found what I was looking for!
Review: After over 20 years of trial and error: air dry, hot/warm/cool blow dry, coconut oil, olive oil, dozens of conditioners, serums -- this is by far the best product for my hair.I shampoo as normal, put in few squirts to hair.  Blow dry on cool.  Then a bit more conditioner and pomade and my hair is silky smooth all day with nice shine.  Glad I finally found this.  Will only ever order this into the future.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: goeey and gluey residue left on ur hair
Review: OMG...this product is nothing like its shampoo. i love the shampoo but this leave in conditioner makes your hair become like glue. After a normal wash, I sprayed on this leave in conditioner and my hair felt like it was all gelled together. It was like putting a whole bottle of coconut oil on your hair. If you want super moisturization then this product is for you. I do not feel like i can wear this product after a wash to go out or go to work. It looks like you havent washed your hair in days. After this really bad feeling, I tried to wash my hair several times and this gooey residue remains. I am hoping this will come off very soon. I am thinking it will take a few more washes.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Good product
Review: I like to use this to cool my scalp on hot days, it smells nice and moisturizes your hair too. I also use it along with my regular Haircare routine regarding the L.O.C method for 4C hair

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love this!
Review: I love this!! This is a must have for curly hair that tends to get tangled easily! Especially with highlights the hair gets dry. This leaves my hair soft and easy to detangle.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Nauseating fragrance
Review: I bought this for the first time on Amazon and after receiving it, I’m so surprised at all the positive reviews mentioning the nice smell. The fragrance is SO overpowering, I can’t even use it. It gave me a headache and I had to take a shower after to get the smell off of me. I included a photo of the bottle I got - I noticed a few people said the label was slightly different than the one you buy in stores so maybe the formula is slightly different? The ingredients do look the same from what I can tell though. Disappointed because the ingredients look good otherwise.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Healthy Safe Ingredients. Leave Hair Feeling Fresh
Review: LOVE this product. I bought primary cause I am a fan of the brand. If you’re not familiar with Shea Moisture they are an amazing brand that consistently delivers high quality products. What really sets them apart is their use of natural and safe ingrediates and that they are chemical free. In the past I’ve struggled to find natural products that still work effectively. Shea Moisture is that brand. With this product specifically I love it cause I can spray on my hair at any time - damp or dry. It has a great smell, goes on very lightly, and doesn’t leave my hair feeling greasy. It’s the perfect quick spray to make my hair a bit healthier. Highly recommend!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Chemical burn!!
Review: I really never leave reviews. But this one I had to. DO NOT USE THIS BRAND. I’ve now tried their conditioner and this spray leave in conditioner. This is what it did to me. Skin was on fire for two days straight. Feels like a chemical burn. Also made my hair incredibly greasy and impossible to brush through. Would never recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Will def order more
Review: Love this! Just Received today. And put on my natural hair single braids sprayed it on. The scent is so delightful, makes my hair moist and soft and love the spray detangler so far. Hair has a condition feel.  Will try once I take down my single braids my hair is 4C So we’ll see how well it detangles later. Love it so far though

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Good hold and controls frizzies!
Review: I was using regular coconut oil in my hair bc I didn’t want a ton of chemicals, but this is a great replacement. How it sprays is a little off...it doesn’t spray smooth like hair spray does. That doesn’t affect it though. Just use your fingers to mix it in your hair, smells great, keeps my frizzies in control and has good hold. My hair isn’t hard but isn’t soft. If I use my fingers it’ll soften and still hold.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not what I imagined
Review: Normally this brand is amazing so I didn't think twice about getting a leave-in conditioner from SheaMoisture. I was desperate, my hair tangles and I'm stuck with knots and matting at the nape of my neck because my hair is so long and thick. I don't shampoo every day, I only condition and rinse, but my hair has its own agenda. I was hopeful with this product but after two days, it honestly sucks. My hair is not soft. It still tangles. And worst of all, my hair feels gross. When I run my fingers through it, my hands are covered in product. If you're looking for a product to add texture to your hair, this would be great. But I'm still on the struggle bus with knotting so I have to look somewhere else.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Too fragrant, holds hair like a gel
Review: I thought this would be more like an oil, given the ingredient list. But this holds hair more like a low hold gel. You can feel that stiffness in the hair. It doesn't spread well either.A couple of reviews pointed this out and I felt the same that the fragrance is waaaay to high- even the neighbors could smell it. Literally! I went out for a run in the evening, maintaining quite a distance from others in this pandemic, and there were heads turning to know where that smell was coming from. I was a running cloud of cheap perfume. Doesn't wash off in a couple of washes. I'd rather sport the smell of coconut oil than this cheap blend of chemicals.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: LOVE!!!!
Review: I love this product, it makes my wavy hair more defined and a little curly. My son is biracial and has thick hair, he ended up using at least half of it. It has a great smell too! Found the only product I need to wear my dye damaged hair down! Better than any leave in I've ever purchased!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: helps maintain hair healthy
Review: Used this product on and off, but now I have been using it more and am pleased with the results. It smells like coconut and its pretty calming after showers if you like that scent. Definitely helps with frizz and makes my hair smooth. Would recommend, especially because a little goes a long way and it's been lasting me.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Most awesome hair product ever!
Review: Winter dryness was causing my hair to look like I stuck my finger in a socket!  When I brushed my hair there was so much static I could hear a crackeling sound.  One application on my dry hair got rid of all that and made my hair soft and smooth without weighing it down (I have long gray hair).  The coconut scent is very subtle. I gave 4 stars on scent only because I prefer unscented products, which are difficult to find and can be expensive..  LOVE LOVE LOVE!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Works great. But I had to put in about 20 sprays.
Review: The first day that I used this, I only put in about seven or eight sprays directly into my hair, and didn't see much of a difference. So the second day I did about 12 sprays into my hair and then another Ten sprays into my hand and then ran it through my hair. That made a huge difference. It left my hair much less frizzy. The curls were much more defined. I usually use WEN, which is great but leaves my hair feeling more creamy, as if I have something in it. This product made my hair feel as if I had nothing at all in it. And it is also so much cheaper. So I ordered another bottle, and we'll keep using it!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Perfect for curly hair
Review: I am getting into the shea moisture hair product collection . So I decided to give this a try because after salons closed for so long in the spring, I was caring for my own curly hair . Once it became more hotter in NY my hair needed some more moisture since I kept it curly for a while , I wanted something that helps keep it moisture, detangled and silky and this leave in has done just that.  Now the salons are open but I still love  by my leave In. I love it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: You should buy it!
Review: I live how soft and moisturizer my hair is after using it. Also, it keeps a lot with the tangles and I don't need to pull my hair anymore. The scent is delicious! I really liked it! I've been using this since almost one month.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Works great for biracial hair
Review: My son is biracial and I was struggling with finding a product that kept the moisture in and did not dry his hair and scalp out. This has been a game changer. I absolutely love this stuff! The dry patch of skin on top of his head has been completely gone since I started using this several months ago. His hair is much softer now as well. I highly recommend it!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Awful smell,threw it out!!!
Review: Won't be buying again! Terrible smell!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Conditioning > detangling
Review: I heard lovely things about this product, and it does leave hair very soft and happy.Unfortunately it's more nourishing than detangling, and my bleached wavy hair needs really a lot of slip to work through tangles.I still use it, I just take more product and work slowly around the knots. If you need moisture over detangling it's probably going to be perfect for you.Smell is really heavenly.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Doesn’t moisturize my hair
Review: Bought this because of the good reviews but am disappointed I don’t see any real moisturizing benefit to my hair. It could just be my hair type… I have fine hair, lightly colored and a lot of it. Going to stick with Moroccan oil for the ends of my hair as it moisturizes much better. I recognize everyone’s hair type is different so this may work better for others.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not ideal for fine hair
Review: I live in the desert so the dryness creates static and static creates hairs knots every day.  I have long fine hair and was hoping this product could help hydrate as well as detangle my hair.After using it several times I discovered that while it smells great and does a wonderful job with helping detangle hair, it leaves my hair dull , stiff and flat. I have now started to simply detangle my hair with conditioner in the shower and that has been working from me much better. I will not be purchasing this product again unfortunately.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Did What It Claimed, But Left Hair VERY Oily
Review: At first the product worked okay. On the second use when I put it in my damp hair, my hair become oily. I have slightly oily scalp but when I started using this spray it only got worse. It had a nice smell but after some time my sister began to tell me that my hair smelled like olive oil. It did do as it claimed, which is defrizz, soften and detangle the hair. But at the cost of leaving it very oily. I feel like it would work better for dry scalp due to how oily it is, but it is all down to weighing the pros and cons. The refund service was excellent so don’t be afraid to try it out.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love It!
Review: Got this product recently for my wavy hair(2b/3c) and I love it! The spray mist is finer than other products in case you want to spray directly on to your hair, I still just spray in to my hands then on to my hair. It’s really hydrating without weighing down my waves or causing them to stretch out. That was really important to me as my hair is easily weighed down with products. Truly recommend and enjoy using both the product and this brand!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Get this product!
Review: I have wild curly/ wavy hair and for months now I’ve been trying to find a product that can control my frizz and this is it! I’ve literally tried at least a dozen different products and this one is so great for everyday use, as I’m trying to bring back my natural curls and straighten my hair less. It’s sooo ridiculously soft on my hair and defines the curls well. The scent is amazing too. You will not be dissapointed

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Too much artificial fragrance.
Review: I made the mistake of reading the ingredient list included in the product description. That is a rather nice list. HOWEVER, the ingredient list in the picture of the BOTTLE is very different. Artificial fragrance is very high on the list and very strong. They must have been bought out. Too bad. Must return.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Quality Control Sucks
Review: Product it self is good the but this is the second time ordering this both times the cap was missing. This time cap missing and leaked product and the spray part of bottle is damaged so won't spray and will leak if not upright. I had to transfer product into an old bottle to use. It would have made even a bigger mess trying to ship back to return. I wont be ordering this here again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Product is nice, sprayer never worked
Review: In Amazon’s defense, they gave me a refund on this product without having to return it; however, I never really got to experience what it’s really like. It seems to be so thick that it clogged up the sprayer, but it does smell nice, is natural, and works to detangle my granddaughter’s knotted long strawberry blonde hair (she screams, it hurts so bad to brush it). Just can’t spray it, have to glob it into my hand.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Spray bottle arrived broken
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   I’ll start with the good:Smells niceDoesn’t feel heavyMy wet hair felt smooth and detangled when I put this inNow for the bad (see video):The bottle did not come with a cap.The pump sprayer arrived completely broken and nonfunctionalI’m currently just dumping a small amount in my palm to apply it to my hair since the sprayer is no functioningI guess I have to find an old spray bottle to pour this into so I can use it properly!?!?!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Serves its purpose but....
Review: My daughter gets major hair knots and this helped smooth it out....BUT it eventually started making her hair oily and developed dandruff...bizarre so maybe I was over doing it and spraying too much after her shower or I used it too often...I would suggest using a little big and on the ends of the hair, not close to scalp to avoid issues like the ones I described.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Immediate Effect, Love it!
Review: On our first use of the product we saw it improve the manageability of my daughter's hair. I also put it in my hair (which was flat ironed a few days earlier) and it did not lose its flatness. So it is not water based. Very nice. Can be used on flat ironed hair, curly hair, dry hair and damp hair. I love the smell too. Very nice.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Gummy Hair
Review: Although this product smelled heavenly, it left yy hair feeling sticky & gummy. At first, I thought I had used to much product so the next time I used less and it still felt gummy and dirty after putting it in my clean hair. I can't say it did much for moisturizing because I couldn't get past the gummy, sticky feeling it left on my hair and ended up rinsing it out both times.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: I'll be buying this forever now...
Review: It's perfect - does not weight my hair down, won't make it greasy, helps detangle and smells so good.  The spray thingy does not clog as well - nice!  I like it so much better than wash-out conditioner.  A little goes a long way.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Best for little girl curls
Review: The spritzer part almost never works. 5 of 6 I think haven’t worked. I using pour into a different spritz bottle with some water to use as a detangler daily. For extra curly curly I use the product straight up. Nice lite scent ( I like this scent more than the kids option).

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not what I expected
Review: Cap was missing, but the bottle seemed otherwise undamaged. No leaks. The ends of my long hair get dry and I wanted something to condition my hair between shampoos. Was hopeful about this product. Followed the directions and sprayed some on damp hair. Made my hair feel stiff and wooden, not soft and pliable. The product is disappointing but too much trouble to return.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Wow this really works ! No tangle anymore
Review: My 5 year old has thin hair and always have tangled hair at the end of a day. I never expect this product can totally solve the problem of it. She loves the scent as well. Her hair looks so smooth and shiny now all the time. I even use for my self after shampooing my hair since i dont use conditioner separately.Thanks to the company and Amazon!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love it but too thick for the sprayer
Review: I love SheaMoisture products and this one is no exception. I bought this to help untangle my hair after shower and it helps a lot. It also has a nice coconut scent that I love and control my hair frizz. The only thing I don't like is the formula is too thick for the sprayer that it's really hard to spray it out. I eventually ditch the sprayer and just pour it in my hand to apply.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Works for me
Review: I have very very thick, dry, frizzy hair. I’ve tried a lot of different products and never really found ‘magic’. This product works better than many I’ve tried and I will buy it again. I spray this on my brush and brush sections of my hair because it’s so thick. It does add a little moisture and has a soft pleasant smell.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great for old white dude hair!
Review: Old white dude with shoulder length long hair. Just got this a couple of weeks ago and I love the way it makes my hair feel. Smell is good but not overpowering. I spray it in after towel dry and comb my hair. I will look into their other hair products when I use my expensive shampoo up.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Greasy!
Review: This did absolutely nothing to help with the dryness of mine or my daughter's hair and left a greasy coating over our strands. Not impressed.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great product, but appears used.
Review: My bottle arrived without a cap and had clearly been used. I was very disappointed since I actually love this product and often find it difficult to purchase in stores in my area. I don’t feel comfortable using it given the condition it arrived in and plan to throw it away. I’d rather lose $10 than lose my hair.  Unfortunately I did not read the reviews from this seller before purchasing, or I would have realized that other customers had the same experience.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Thrown in the bag!
Review: This item arrived without a safety seal or cap on the bottle like it was just thrown in the bag and mailed off from sitting on someone's dresser or something!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not for my hair
Review: My hair is medium-fine and didn't absorb any moisture from this product. It sat on my hair and made it oily. However, when I rinsed my hair the next day because I couldn't take the oiliness any longer, my hair felt pretty good. So I could probabaly use this as a deep conditioner.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love love love!
Review: Love this so much! Leaves my hair so soft & not crunchy feeling, plus it smells sooo good! Normally I have to get my dead ends trimmed every 8 weeks & the last time I went my hair dresser said my ends looked great & I didn't need a trim! That is a really big deal for me as I have been trying to grow my hair out for what seems like eternity!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Leaves hair greasy
Review: It leaves my hair moisturized, just a little too much. I have very fine, frizzy hair, so I needed something light to tame it. I use this occasionally, but I would recommend other products over this one

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: doesn’t leave hair greasy
Review: doesn’t leave hair greasy

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Amazing!!!
Review: I have tried all the expensive hair products and I couldn’t believe the results I got for the price. I also use the shampoo and conditioner and my hair has changed dramatically. It’s so soft and I even got compliments on how healthy it is.The only problem was that it arrived with no lid and was damaged.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells great
Review: I have very thick soft hair and it's frizzy. This product smells amazing and works wonders on my hair! My hair is smooth and shiny, I have gotten a few compliments. You don't need a lot, just spray in the middle (not roots) and brush your hair then blow dry. I usually towel dry, then spray and wrap with towel for an hour before blow dry.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: BEST de tangler and BEST smell
Review: You GUYS. This stuff is amazing. I was on edge because it was so cheap and I was thinking it couldn’t be that great. I have very thick curly crazy hair and this stuff is the only thing that works for me. The coconut smell literally leaves your hair smelling so clean! And yes, it really does smell like coconut. It’s a good size, I have a ton of hair and only use about three sprays after I shower and my tangles come right out. Love it. Would definitely recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love it but wasn't wrapped and no cap!
Review: Love my leave in! The only thing that was missing from the bottle was the plastic wrapping and the cap though all the others in the order were wrapped individually in plastic and had their caps!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Sad waste of money for quality and fragrance. However, our dog, Atticus, gets both wash & RINSE!
Review: I really wanted to like this conditioner but the smell, to me, is terrible and the ability to work as a softener is simply not there. I’m sincerely disappointed because I keep trying it to use it up. It isn’t worth it and I’ve decided to take the loss. Check it out if you like but if you want a nice coconut fragrance, my opinion is that it was a waste of money. There is just too many great products to choose from much better than this one. We are using on the dog after a bath. He doesn’t seem to mind the smell! Ha:-)

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Doesn’t work
Review: Does not detangle at all. I have fine hair and it does nothing to help with tangles. It does leave it a little softer, and if you use to much it makes your hair greasy and wet looking, but that’s about it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: One of my favorite products.
Review: I love this sheamoisture leave in.I have been using this for several years now.It does what it needs to do.I wake up and unwrap my hair, its usually dry. I spray this conditioner in my hair, and it soften it right up.Making it more manageable to style and go.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love this product
Review: Does wonders for my curly hair. Love this, makes my hair soft and smells very good. Will buy again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Unsealed product.
Review: I had to replace this bottle.  The replacement is a little better.  Still not sure if I want to use it.  If Sellers would focus on their packaging as much as they do on their product, it would not create such an inconvenience on all parties involved.  We live in turbulent times.  I would no longer want to put anything on my head, face, or body that looks tampered with than I would in my mouth.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells awful
Review: This doesn’t make my hair feel any softer at all. In fact, it doesn’t smell anything like coconut at ALL. It smells like pickles or vinegar! Will not be using.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Product is mid okey, but shipping is less than 1 star
Review: I ordered this on dec 23, it was supposed to arrive on 28th. Which is a long time for Prime, but ok, I took the deal. However, they didn’t even ship out this product until the 28th!!! I waited until 30th to receive this product and it came like the picture. One bottle okey, but the other one covered, COVERED with leaking product. The nozzle doesn’t work too. The product is fine at most, but the broken parts, the shipping and the leaking, it’s not worth the money.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Works fine. Arrived with no cap
Review: Smell is nice. I use it on myself and my 2yo daughter who has curly hair. It works great for detangling. Not a big issue but it arrived without a CAP on it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: SHOCKING RESULTS!
Review: I love this. I have never used something like this before and I will now continue to use it. After applying this product out of the shower, my comb ran thru my hair so easily. The smell is good, but not too strong. My hair feels so much better. You all need to try this seriously!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Another great product!!!
Review: I love ALL the Shea Moisture products.  I've used them on my son since birth and he will be six end of June.  He has longer, fine, blonde hair and the leave in condioner keeps it soft making it easy for him to brush and maintain.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: I was not expecting this.....
Review: Just received this product, and I was disappointed with it.  I wanted to like it..but it actually left my hair feeling a little dry (moisturizing product?) and did not have a clean feeling, considering my hair had been shampooed

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: its perfect
Review: this treats my curly hair so well, it smells amazing, makes my hair soft, less frizzy, gives it the right amount of volume, and feels refreshing, I can use it while my hair is wet and brush it through, or I can pad it on while dry to moisturize and make my hair look freshly washed. I have 2b-2c hair and I have a friend with 3c hair who also uses this every day. I would definitely buy this again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: The BEST Leave-in Ever!
Review: I only purchased this conditioner because my usual go-to leave-in conditioner (Creme of Nature Argan Oil) was out-of-stock everywhere; however, I was pleasantly surprised! This has to be the BEST leave-in I've ever used. The consistency is thick & rich, & the smell is delightful! Most importantly, it thoroughly moisturizes my hair, leaving it soft, silky, & manageable. I am not mixed, however, my hair is "mixed type", coily. It is fairly easy to comb through, but it can become kinky if I don't keep it properly hydrated. This is now, officially, my favorite leave-in!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Defective Sprayer, will not spray!
Review: I really want to love this product, and was excited to try it, but when I got it today and opened the package, the sprayer will not work at all! I sat pumping the nozzle for several minutes to no avail. Can't even try the product because it simply will not spray at all.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Thumbs up!
Review: I really like this leave in conditioner. It’s perfect for after the pool!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Makes my hair so soft
Review: I use this to keep my hair from Frizzell in humidity.  While it doesn't frizz, I do wind up with big 80's hair.  I don't mind it though because it looks so thick and luxurious and its very soft to touch.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Leaves hair silky
Review: Great! Leaves hair silky. Definitely detangles well...the hair looks good after wash. Better than many other products in this category.One negative is it contains perfume. Could have been avoided.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Spray cap does not work.
Review: I could not get the spray cap to function. It was so cheaply made that I decided the product itself may also be poorly made. I was afraid it had been tampered with. I have applied for a refund and it was issued but I did not receive the credit. I will update the review should it come through.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Perfect!
Review: Very nice product,  it added moisture and reduced frizz while it didn't feel heavy or sticky.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Detangles!
Review: Bought this on a lightning deal and will buy again.  A great way to detangle hair after a shower!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great product
Review: Love this product! I have long thin hair and it moisturizes and thickensMy hair. I will buy again. And knowing that there are no harsh chemicals in this makes it even better.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love this product!
Review: I have been using this product for years! Love the coconut scent (and my friends do too) and my hair needs constant moisture and this product gives my hair curl and smells great!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love the scent!
Review: During the winter it gets so dry and my hair is everywhere. I just spray this in either right after I wash it or when it's dry and needs a little taming. Be sure to brush it through if you spray it on dry hair as it can leave little white globs in your hair if you don't. It has a great scent, too! 100% will buy this again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love it
Review: Fabulous for my fine over processed hair! Left it feeling shiny! When I first put it on my wet hair I didn't feel the difference until it dried and I was so happy with results! Great leave in conditioner,  I even use a small amount on my babies messy hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Excellent Product - no tube to spray with
Review: This a great product, however the spray function does not work as there is no tube inside to spray with. I lost product trying to search for the tube to make the sprayer work. I have to put the product in my hands to use. That causes waste.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Poor Bottle quality
Review: Smells very nice, bottle will not spray because the tubing connected to the pump was broken off and can't be placed to use the product. Had to buy another spray bottle to put the product in to use it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: My Hairdresser complimented my hair!
Review: My hairdresser asked "What are you using on your hair as it's the healthiest I've ever seen it!" I've noticed my hair has really started growing too since using this product. I'm very happy with it and will continue to purchase.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Perfect for my baby girls’ hair!
Review: I love this for my girls’ hair!! Better than hair lotions or detangling sprays bcuz it comes ready to use in one spray bottle. I will continue to buy.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: On the Fence
Review: I ordered this product because I love this brand and I was hoping to get a mild scent but either there was an error in packaging or the "Coconut" smells like a strong flower and this is not a scent I prefer.  Does not smell like expected

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great for my hair
Review: Just used for the first time today after my shower.  I have wavy hair and it my hair less frizzy and curlier.  The spray bottle is not great, it squirts in 3 different directions.  Great smell, reminds me of sunbathing.  I will definitely buy again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Will reorder
Review: I am very pleased with this item and will re-order it when I run out smells great leaves my hair feeling soft. I was worried about a sticky residue however I have not encountered one as of yet. I put on my hair when it is either wet or dry.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells bad, but works.
Review: The product smells really bad. I don’t have an overly sensitive nose or anything. It’s sickly sweet. BUT, if you’re looking for something that will moisturize your hair, this will do the trick.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Very good detangler and conditioner!
Review: Very light if left in after shampooing. Quickly removes tangles and moisturizes hair as well as a rinse-out conditioner without the heaviness. I even use this on my dog's dry skin/coat between washes. The smell could be a little lighter, but that's the only thing that could use work!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Does not soften or add moisture
Review: Bleh! Not happy at all with this product. It doesn’t add immediate softness like some of the other brands I’ve used in the past. I had to yank my comb through my hair, then ended up using the remaining leave in conditioner left over from my other product. Disappointing!!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great product, if only it sprayed better
Review: Love the smell.  Love the product.  The container doesn't work for me.  Hard to actually spray and doesn't cover any of my hair.  I end up having to spray it on my hands and then scrunch into my hair.  The product doesn't go far.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Strong chemical smell
Review: The smell is very strong. The ingredients say essential oils as the fragrance, however the smell is very chemical based, not an essential oil. The smell lingers even after blow drying.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Very moisturizing
Review: I am now on my third bottle of this leave-in conditioner and introduced it to my mom who also loves it. It is very moisturizing without leaving your hair heavy and oily.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Perfect for my daughter's hair
Review: My 10 month old daughter is biracial, so hair care is a new adventure we are on together. This product is PERFECT to combat any dryness she had previously and help define her curls. My husband and I apply this for her after bath before bed, and in the morning. Super easy to spray on and comb through, which on a 10 month old is saying something! It has helped her hair texture/moisture so much! 10/10 would recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Refresh and moisturize!
Review: Have tried so many products, but this one is my favorite! So moisturizing bur doesn't leave my hair looking oily or crunchy....just soft and curls in place all day!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Nozzel doesn’t work!
Review: The Nozzle does not work. To pay $10 for one bottle and to receive the item in good condition-  and for it not to spray out - is very frustrating. I’ve tried to make it work on my own but it isn’t working I’m upset about that - but if the nozzle did work this product would get five stars easily.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Straw is extremely short.  Won't pump.
Review: I bought this corr my niece for Christmas.  It seems to work but the 'straw' that gets the product to the sprayer is extremely short.  is it supposed to be this way?  It no longer touches the product.  I have to hold it upside down to get anything to spray out.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not what I hoped for
Review: First it came in broken. There was no way I could spray this into my hair. I tried putting it into another spray bottle and it did not come out. So I just had to put it in my hands and work it into my hair. I smells really good but it did not help tame my frizz at all.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: it won't spray...!
Review: why would one make a product that's not usable as the spray that is suggested in the directions...?  it possibly may be a decent product, but it will be difficult to test.  i have used shea moisture products in the past and i also purchased the enhancing smoothie which is thank goodness not a spray.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Broken spray function
Review: Barely used three times and pump function broke. Need to make sure don’t apply too much or hair will look greasy. Smells good. Not sure I would buy again

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: It's a must habe
Review: I love this. It makes my natural hair so soft and smells really good.The problem is it cannot spray. I have to open it when using.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Good
Review: "Good hair conditioner - I have thick hair and this helps me get the knots out and leaves my hair soft" -my wife

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Spray nozzle clogged on first use
Review: I was really hoping a spray could cut down on my  long conditioner routine time but the spray nozzle clogged on the first use so I've been taking off the cap and pouring it out into my hands to use, which is actually talking more time than the pots of leave-in that Shea Moisture makes... Smells nice but too much of a bother to buy again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Amazing buy
Review: I use this after my shower on my mid-lengths and to the ends of my hair, plus I add some of this product on my non hair wash days. It truly does keep my hair soft.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Don't waste your money.
Review: So I was really hoping this would help.  Not so much. While it doesn't leave your hair really stiff..I found no softening  whatsoever...hoping to send it back.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells so good.
Review: Creates curl and awesome smell.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: It works and smells good
Review: This has helped my hair so much. It's super fine and gets weighed down easily and this works just don't put to much on. It smells good 2. My first bottle didn't pump I told Amazon and they sent a new one overnight! Awesome!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not the best detangler
Review: Nice light scent. Product did leak a little during shipment. Not as detangling as I had hoped for. Will still use for now, but will try a different product next time.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Long lasting!
Review: Works well on my curly hair as a leave in!Does not weigh it down, also great to use as a refresher! Must have for me!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Just buy it!
Review: Perfect for my hair. Before shea moisture my over processed wavy hair was super damaged. Had been for years. (Beyond repair in my opinion). I couldn’t even brush without washing it. And depression hair was awful. Thankfully, my hair is happy.. healthy and still vibrantly colored! I use the entire line of Shea moisture products and will never go back.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not very impressed
Review: I got this to help create some slip when brushing my wet hair after the shower. I have fine, straight hair. The smell is lovely but I don’t notice any difference in terms of conditioning and detangling.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Mixture is too pure to spray, you must mix with water
Review: Sealed and smelled great. I used this product for the first time and my curls lasted for days with no frizz. it is very pure so you need to add some water in a spray bottle to get it on your hair bc the bottle itself can't spray.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: It does cause contact dermatitis to those with sensitivity!!!
Review: I saw that some reviews said they developed a rash, but I still purchased and hoped for the best. Found out very quickly that it caused my usual break out around the eyes. I don’t know exactly what causes this, but if you are someone like me with sensitivity to sunscreens and other over the counter products, stay away from this product! Otherwise, it really does work great and smell good, I just have to hide from the world for about a week now.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: Sorry to say, I am very disappointed, with the manner this item was delivered. There, was no cover on the bottle, Even though, other reviews talk about the lovely scent, NO SCENT in this bottle, I am wondering if what is in the bottle is what should be in there.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Product is been reformulated with a strong smell.
