Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I think this leave-in conditioner should get a 5 in stars just for the smell, It's a creamy coconut smell, you can smell the shea butter as well. I am a person that can wash my hair and the next day looks like a grease ball, so I am always worried about product making it look greasy or more oily especially with this coming out creamy. It did not make my hair greasy at all, it left it smooth, soft and had me sniffing it all day. Not only am I using it but my husband sprays it on his beard to make it soft and smell great all day long. I will say this is my new favorite leave-in conditioner.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is  a great quality conditioner.  It is a tad misleading by advertising it is 100% virgin coconut oil.  What is may mean is the coconut oil it contains is 100% virgin, but that is not the sole ingredient.There is enough oil in it though to make this a very good leave-in product.  It is not going to make your hair greasy as long as you use it properly; spray in/work in a little, don't go wild with it.My daughters all have long hair and love it, to help restore the sheen to their hair after using blow dryers, straightening irons, etc.IngredientsWater, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin (Vegetable), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*Û , Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Coconut Acid, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Algae Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit (Rosehip) Oil, Tocopherol, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Acacia Senegal Gum Extract, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend) *Certified Organic Ingredient. Û Fair Trade Ingredient. Natural ingredients may vary in color and consistency.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My son's long 3a/3b curls are just awesome, but his low porosity hair makes upkeep a disaster.  Detangling is the hardest part because he is so tenderheaded.  I have used everything.  However, when I used the SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Leave-In Treatment detangling produced very little tears with curls that were hot n' poppin'!After doing our usual wash day routine using the entire SheaMoisture Low Porosity line.  (Shampoo, Conditioner, and Manuka Honey Deep Conditioner).  I then detangled using the 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Leave-In Treatment.  Lastly, I detangled more using the SheaMoisture Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Style Milk.  I then sealed a little bit with SheaMoisture FlaxSeed Oil and Argan Oil.  (I'm really not an exclusively SheaMoisture girl, it just worked out that way that day)AN ENTIRE WEEK!!  An entire week went by with detangled, moisture locked in curls.  The frizzies stayed away until the end of the week.  Plus, detangling on his tenderhead was so much easier!  So, for him, this was a godsend.  I have used it on my 4C low porosity hair during the week.  I would say my hair didn't really get much of a reaction.  I didn't feel like it was really that moisturizing (admittedly I used it on dry hair which with my 4C low porosity hair is the worst test subject)  But I could see how lightweight it felt on my hair.  For my son, I can't be more happy.Now, at $15 a bottle!  Yeah, no.  I've never paid more than $12 from anything SheaMoisture.  So, when this bottle runs out, I'm going to have to think long and hard about whether I want to continue with this product.  Also, the bottle really isn't conducive to allowing the product to come out.  My hand slips on the bottle because I am working with wet hair and when my hand is wet with water and product it slips.  My bottle also came without a cap.  I saw that other people experienced that too.  So, maybe SheaMoisture should work on sealing the cap on.  That way we know the integrity of the product is still intact.  One other thing I didn't really like was not knowing where this product was going to spray.  Sometimes it sprays everywhere but on the hair.  On the floor, on the curtains, on the walls.  A different spray bottle I think it warranted.  Overall, this product is great for 3a/3b folks, but at $15 I would be trying to find something else, which is a shame because SheaMoisture typically has really great products at decent prices.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love all SheaMoisture products so I knew I would be happy with this one!  I have fine thin slightly wavy hair and find my ends dry out pretty quickly.  I have used the SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave-In Conditioner for about 4 years so when I came across this product I knew I would love it.  With the weather getting cold my hair is getting static-y and this has really helped.  I use this with my other leave-in conditioner but I have also been using it by itself on dry hair when the ends are looking really dry and frizzy or my hair is getting static-y and it works really well.  It leaves my hair feeling smooth, looking shiny, and it smells great.  I love that its a spray bottle because it is less messy than a jar or bottle.  Another great product from SheaMoisture!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Because my hair is fairly soft, I can’t say I noticed any significant difference in the softening qualities attributed to the Coconut Daily Hydration Leave-in Treatment.  However, its being soft means there is very little natural body, and I did notice after using it that my hair felt as though it had more substance of its own. As with most leave-in products, I would just like to note that it does take longer for your hair to dry.  If you haven’t heard used a similar product before, you’ll have a heads-up.  As a detangler, I felt like it left something to be desired.  I felt like I had to use a lot even with shorter hair. This is the main reason I deducted one star.  The coconut fragrance, clearly stated in the advertising text, is pleasant and not overwhelming, and I always consider it a bonus when there are as few chemical additives as possible. In comparing cost per value, I believe this product is reasonable.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: No more tears!
Review: My 2 year old twirls her hair to go to sleep which creates these massive knots. Then of course with her car seat it looks like a rats nest isn’t he back too. This product has made such a difference! It’s so much easier to brush and even detangling the knots. No more tears here!My 5 year old has long hair and being an active child it often gets into knots and is hard to brush in the evenings. This product has made her hair so much softer and easier to brush.I’ve been using this product for both my girls. I spray it on after they’ve gotten out of the bath. I towel dry their hair and then wait about 10 minutes and apply it. Then I’ll brush their hair. I love the smell and knowing I’m using good quality ingredients on my girls head. We also use the Shea Moisture baby shampoo and body wash. Love these products!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells soooo bad.
Review: This product smells aweful. As much as they tried to make it more natural… they ruined it with the most overwhelming synthetic fragrance smell possible. It says "essential oil blend" but I can assure you there are hardly any essential oils in this. Essential oils have a pleasant scent and rapidly dissapate due to their volatile nature. Synthetic fragrances linger for many hours, as does this product.They ruined a fine product for no reason. Why should my hair smell like sickly sweet fake smell?

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Knock Off, Fake Product
Review: I use this product religiously; I typically buy it at Target or Walgreens and I wanted to try “Subscribe and Save” to save a little money. The bottle on the left without the cap is my bottle, and the bottle on the right is what I received from Amazon. I believe this product is a knock-off. The scent and texture seems similar to the original, but the packaging looks off. Namely, the label is matte and it does not show the same “sulfate free” claim that my original product does. I don’t want to risk causing any damage to my hair or skin so I will be returning this.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I've been using this on my daughter's hair to refresh during the week.  She has somewhat coarse, dry hair with 3A/3B curls   I wash it about once a week, spray with water bottle, and add some type of conditioner or detangler, comb through with a vented brush, and scrunch a bit to restore her curls. As a detangler, this works great.  Her hair is very long and the ends get really tangled.  Once I use enough to detangle, this can weigh down her hair a bit so her hair is straighter at the base and her curls aren't as bouncy. A little goes along way with this, so it's a good value.  The spray is pretty localized, so you need to spread it throughout the hair.  I'm not sure why this wouldn't be better in a pump. I love the coconut smell.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I didn't have much expectation for this product and thought there is no way this can moisturize my hair. However, I was pleasantly surprise at how good it worked to an extent. I first tried this on my morning hair which is usually when my hair is the driest after sleeping on it all night (I'm a back sleeper and I don't cover my hair and my current pillow case isn't satin). I sprayed it on the back of my hair and the ends which are the driest and it instantly gave it the moisture it needed that I used it to re-wet my hair instead of water and then out the door I went. My hair stayed in its style as expected and did not get dry as the day prolong which was awesome. I used it this way for several more days. Next, I tried it one night after I washed  my hair and was too lazy to put in the Jamaican Castor Oil leave-in conditioner . I quickly spray this in and didn't work it through too much in my hair and just went to bed. I was pleased that when I woke the morning, my hair felt moisturized, not the same as when I use the cream based leave-in conditioner but definitely not try, I sprayed more on it the morning, but realize there was no way I could just use this product on its own as my styler for the day as it didn't give my hair the moisture it needed to be able to hold up my style for the day without my hair getting dry. Therefore, I had to use my cream-based leave-in conditioner in order to style my hair.This is a good co treatment being it should be used with a cream-based leave i conditioner and NOT by itself unless your looking for a quick moisturizer before bed or staying home as you're lazy to put in the cream based one in your hair. It is also good as a re-wetter for next day hair as you don't need a lot to revive your hairstyle. It's better than other re-wetting products on the market as its liquid is not thick like others. If you're looking to get this to replacement cream-based leave-in conditioners, I would NOT recommend this.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Pros and cons
Review: Disclaimer - I have thick, coarse, curly, ethnic hair and at times, I put in extensions but not over my entire head.As for the smell - This has a nice, soft coconut scent.When you 1st spray it, it's not like a gel spray where you spray and you can't see it. Once you spray this, it will look like you sprayed "milk" in your hair so you do have to either run your fingers through or use a comb/brush.It does a decent job at detangling your hair. I don't wash my hair daily (not good for your hair/scalp) so on the days that I don't wash it, these are the steps that I take for unwashed hair (for washed hair, just skip the 1st step).1) Spray my hair with water2) Spray the leave-in conditioner3) Comb hairWithout using any other product but this leave in conditioner, I noticed that it did a nice job on my extensions with keeping it tame. As for my natural, curly hair, it didn't do a great job at keeping the frizz down.Overall, good product.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Best thing I've tried for my curls
Review: This has absolutely been the best product I've tried for my curls. I've used other products with good results, but after a while, they either changed formula or my hair just stopped reacting the same way. This has been great, though. My curls are soft and don't frizz, and even hold after being in a ponytail. I will say, I am also using TIGI's Catwalk Curl Activator after putting this in. That combo seems to work even better than this alone, but this alone works wonderfully. Also, the bottle says to use on damp hair, but I have put it on dry hair and it soaks in fine. I can't wash my hair more than every few days, so I need to be able to add a touch between washings, and it's worked fine.The only negative: this being a spray....it gets everywhere if I try to spray it directly on. Instead, I spray it into my palm, then apply it to my hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: Shea Moisture can do no wrong in my book. The ingredients are always high quality and my hair loves them. The consistency is like heavy cream. It has a pleasant coconut scent. The leave-in boosts my hair's hydration and attacks tangles. It also works well as a refresher spray if you water it down a little.Thanks so much for taking the time to read this review. I hope the information that I've provided makes your decision a little easier.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Smells amazing and keeps curls hydrated and defined.
Review: My daughter has extremely curly hair that dries out quickly and becomes frizzy anytime it’s not wet. We’ve been using the leave in treatment from sheamoistire every other morning when styling her hair before school. First I spray water and completely brush out all the tangles then I add a little more water and the leave in treatment to the lower half of her hair and use my hands to work it in. First of all it smells amazing if you like the smell of coconut and it definitely helps to define her curls and help keep them hydrated so her hair doesn’t become frizzy.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Wow!!!
Review: I really love this stuff, especially the scent!! And my hair is soooo soft now!! I highly recommend this product!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I'm not really sure what this leave-in is supposed to do.  It doesn't de-tangle and it really doesn't help with styling.  The only thing good I can say is that it smells REALLY good.  Smells like coconut or a pina colada.  I could almost turn it up and drink it!  That's about it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Not for fine hair
Review: This is 3 stars for fine hair. I have very fine hair and this weighed it down and made my hair look greasy (with light application). It did make my hair feel really nice and soft though. The smell is standard coconut. I think this would be great for people with thick and curly hair that want definition to their hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I got this for my daughter who struggles with rinsing conditioner. I suggested she didn't need that and use this leave in conditioner to detangle per instructions. She much prefers this to rinsing conditioner and her hair brushes easily and doesn't look oily.I like that it's free from phosphates. Saves water too. I'm happy; she's happy. Win win.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Great for wigs!
Review: I put this is a wig after I washed and conditioned it and it gave it moisture without weighing it down. It smells amazing, but that also causes it to attract bugs. I wore this in my hair on a farm and I was getting attacked by bees that wanted to get in my hair. Id say be cautious when wearing in the summer and outside because of that.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Anything from this line is awesome
Review: The bottle looks just as pictured. This entire line smells great. This product, in particular, does add moisture to your hair but just keep in mind that it is a very wet product. Thus, it does make your hair very wet while moisturizing it. One it is moisturized, though, it does not stay moisturized for as long as I would like— you have to keep adding this product in order to eep your hair moisturized. The plus is that it is not a greasy product.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: 100% pure ingredients, made in the USA!!!  This Coconut Oil Treatment leaves my hair untangled, Soft, Shiny and best of All my hair no longer looks Tired and Dry!!!  Love this stuff....and I smell SO Amazing!!!  The Fresh and Clean Coconut scent stays with you all day long!!!  Excellent, Pure, Wonderful Product!!!  Thank you!!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Super amazing! I recommend you try it!
Review: Super amazing!! I have super long frizzy wavy hair that I always struggle to detangle. This does a great job detangling and moisturizing it without weighing my hair down or making it greasy. Works on dry and wet hair! Also has a super great fresh coconut smell that’s clean and reminds me of summer. Love it very much and highly recommend

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Had to return it!!!
Review: I thought since this was advertised as organic, it would not have artificial fragrance - WRONG. I am highly fragrance sensitive, and this fragrance was overpowering to me. I had to immediately rinse it out. It is also advertised as a "spray." Mine did not spray, but rather it squirted - all over my shirt.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Works best on damp to wet hair- the product is somewhat thick so this way you're not having to use a ton of product and it detangles really good. Smells good. Even though it's thick, it's not to the point of making it hard to spray out of the bottle. It's been working great for my 8-year-old-mixed-princess. She has a sensory disorder so having a good product to help detangle as gently as possible is a must! Also one that's going to condition and help keep her curls healthy 👸🏾

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like this conditioner more than I thought I would.  Most tend to weigh down my hair, but I haven't experienced that with this product. I put a little on my hands before blow-drying my hair, and it helps to protect it from the heat and to add some volume and texture. I find that throughout the day, my hair feels sleeker and thicker.  I don't use a lot, just a little, mostly on my ends.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I use this on myself and my son (whonis biracial with curly hair) this detangles and restores his curls like no other product! By far one of my favorites from Shea Moisture and the smell is amazing! This is best for thicker textured hair as it is very moisturizing product.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: No cap!
Review: No cap!! Where's the cap! Can't travel with this.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Love the natural ingredients
Review: Excellent product. It has a lot of natural ingredients that are great for your hair. My hair is so soft after using it. I use it directly after I get out of the shower. It’s not too overwhelming either so you don’t have to worry about your hair getting greasy.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This spray leave in milky conditioner is made from 100% virgin coconut oil and it helps hydrate my hair. I use it fresh out of the shower after towel drying my hair. I use liberal spritzes and saturate my hair and comb it through. The scent is light and it helps keep my hair from out of control frizziness and helps keep it shinier.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Surprised honestly
Review: I actually really like this. Me and my son have 4b hair and he has dreads i have a fro. It really moisture nicely and smells amazing. I use it morning  daily and I use aloe vera juice spray at night. His dreads look way better.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: So moisturizing!
Review: We put this in my daughter's hair like a detangler and then braid her hair. She desperately needs to go a couple of days between washing, so braids are big for us. She gets excited on braid days because she won't have to wash her hair that night. She loves the scent, and I love how it works and the company that it comes from. Decent ingredients, and great performance. Love this!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: I never walk away from a shower without putting this in after!
Review: Best hair care product I’ve ever used! I used to have issues with my hair getting that greasy feeling the day after showering and would wash my hair daily(not great for your hair) since I’ve been using this leave in treatment my hair is soft for days and smells amazing!! I can’t leave the bathroom after a shower without brushing this in first or I can TELL THE DIFFERENCE. This is my only daily treatment aside from shampoo/conditioner

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This coconut oil spray is great for my curly hair. It doesn’t spray very well like a fine mist, it’s more of a squirt than a spray, but that is ok for my needs. I use it on wet hair before I dry it. It’s not suitable for dry hair unless you must it with a spray bottle of water a little.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars

While I’m not a huge fan of the lingering coconut scent it leaves in his hair, he doesn’t mind it, and it does seem to make the whole brushing process a lot less painful.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: AMAZING PRODUCT...
Review: I love this leave in. I have been transitioning for a little over a year and usually wear my hair straight. I used it for the first time yesterday after washing my hair to detangle! My hair was so soft manageable and smelled amazing.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz

After applying, it smelled super musty and gross, like suffocatingly musty.  Absolutely hated it.  I won't throw it away because I don't want to waste the money, but it will literally be emergency use only.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Decent, but wouldn’t buy again.
Review: Okay, so I was hoping for a conditioning spray, and what I got was a cream conditioner in a spray bottle that comes out as a stream. Because it doesn’t spritz, I can’t apply it directly on my hair, so I apply it to my hands and attempt to comb it thorough. The smell is AMAZING, and this product does help with frizz control, but I haven’t noticed any moisturizing qualities on my ends. I would also say that because of the way the product applies, it doesn’t work great as a de-tangler either because you have to comb it through with your hands to actually disperse the product. So it doesn’t penetrate the knots. It’s just okay. I will use it, but I won’t buy it again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Just wasn’t for me
Review: I’m sure this is a good product for others but it wasn’t for my hair. I have straight brunette 20 inch hair and I wanted something that would help me brush my hair easily but this kinda did the opposite for me. After spraying it on my hair it started to feel stiff And my hair strands were getting glued together which was very odd and I quickly rinsed it off. Again, I’m sure it’s a good product but it just didn’t work well for my personal use.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: Weighs your hair down

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Types 100% Extra Virgin 8 oz
Title: There are less expensive, better products
Review: This product smells good, but it takes a lot of sprays to reduce tangles...so many sprays that your hair becomes heavy and flat. I have found that Garnier Fructus Sleek and Shine works SO MUCH BETTER and is MUCH LESS EXPENSIVE.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 2c 3a hair, fan of the product but not the fragrance.
Review: I have a very very sensitive scalp, and low porosity, 2c/3a hair thats fairly thin and very dense. This gave me good moisture that did not weigh me down, but compared to the “knot today” from aunt jackies I usually use, i needed to use ALOT of product. But the moisture did penetrate deeper and not leave a sticky residue or any buildup.I ended up mixing this with jojoba oil and using it as a leave on under a cap for like an hour and my hair has never been that soft.My biggest qualm with this and honestly every shea moisture product is that the fragrance is SO heavy. Fragrance is a really bad irritant that can mess your skin up, give you allergic contact dermatitis and even sensitize you to other products over time.People act like essential oils are better for this but... essential oils are VERY concentrated volatile oils and you should not ever apply them directly to your skin. People act like natural unprocessed ingredients are always better. Y’all there are natural things that would have no problem killing you and penicillin isn’t exactly natural.I did not realize how much fragrance was in this product until i used it and ladies it’s alot. Fragrance really shouldn’t be listed as a main ingredient. I wish they had other options.The conditioner seems to work ok as i rinse some out and apply it to my hair not my skin, but whenever i use shea moisture shampoo it eventually breaks my scalp out into a rash and it’s not fun. Sometimes i even get breakouts along my scalp from the shampoo because it’s basically just parfum with some mild cleansers in it.They make the stuff that works the best for my hair but it always smells SO freaking intense and breaks my scalp out and that’s just such a bummer. Also shea moisture actually seems like a really nice ethical company, and i wish they made safer products for people with sensitive skin so i could actually buy from them instead of all these other beauty companies that sell progressivism and use women and the idea of helping the environment as an advertisement but buy ingredients linked to the slave trade, sell skin lightening cream in other countries, and have a rainforests worth of palm oil in every plastic bottle.Sorry for going off like that about conditioner but it’s not really just conditioner.My products arrived on time and were as advertised.I wouldn’t recommend this if you have kinky curls or coils, but thinner curls and waves like mine would probably do well with this product.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Strong fragrance, moisturizing product
Review: I really like this product line, but their strong scents get overwhelming for me. I’ve learned to purchase Shea Moisture shampoos & conditioners that list the “fragrance” near the end of the ingredient list, rather than near the top, as then the scent is not as strong.I purchased this one after looking at the ingredient list that is posted. Unfortunately when I received the bottle, I saw the ingredient list here is different than the one on the bottle. And as I suspected after smelling the conditioner, the ingredient list has fragrance as one of the top ingredients.I’ve emailed the company before, and even though their ingredient lists say the fragrance is an “essential oil blend,” it is actually a blend of fragrance with essential oils. So for those who are sensitive to fragrance, this is important to know.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Recommended for thicker, curlier hair types
Review: This product did not work for me as I had hoped. I bought this product because I have fine, wavy/curly hair, and was seeking a silicone-free conditioner to help restore my curl pattern. I chose SheaMoisture for the price, coconut scent, and reviews on other hair websites. After using for a week, I found that this conditioner left my hair smelling great, but did not rinse out easily. This product might work better on thicker, curlier hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: TOP 10 REVIEWER
Review: I have been using Shea Moisture products on and off for several years. I have used pretty much everything they have to offer for hair and skin. I tend to stay away from hair products that coat the hair with silicone. This entire line is silicone free, and is easy to find online and in stores. Says that it is good for daily use, so I expected a light conditioner and it is. I have super long (nearly waist length) thick, multi textured hair (waves, curls, sometimes almost straight). When my hair is shorter, it is curlier. Despite the length, it acts like curly hair- a little frizz, a little dryness, a little mayhem. I would say this is one of their lighter formulations. The viscosity is more lotion like than some of their super thick creams of the past which were near impossible to pump out. For me it pumps out from the bottle easily. I add a generous amount to wet hair, and let it sit for a few minutes, then rinse well. My hair is lightly moisturized and smells nice.This is also one of the lightest in terms of fragrance. I have sometimes found their products to be overly scented (shea butter aroma and essential oils blend). This one smells extra fresh, clean, and light. The light scent lingers on the hair and just smells nice. I am prone to scent nausea, and this doesn't trigger any sick feels or headaches. Of course, you may have different opinion and experience.Additional uses:--I have used their conditioners as leave-in conditioners, and this one is a really good contender for that since it is extra light.--scrunching in a little after hair dries (or next day) to refresh style, smooth frizzies, and add a little scented freshness and  moisture.--I haven't tried it yet, but I have also made detangling spray using a squirt of their conditioner along with some water in a spray bottle.--C.0.-wash (conditioner only wash). I don't care to wash my hair daily, maybe 3-4x a week. I do like to shower daily. On non hair wash days, I aim to not get my hair wet. Usually once a week on a non shampoo day I will wet my hair and just condition it. This does not clean the hair, but it does rinse out some environment build up, and adds a level of freshness and moisture by just conditioning it. Get hair really really wet- like, pretend you are shampooing the hair and cleaning the scalp, then wring out hair, add conditioner, let sit, then rinse really well.I have another line I prefer, but Shea Moisture is my go-to second line. It has been there for me for many years, and it is always a treat to try something new. Most of their products fair OK on the EWG database, for those that are curious.Ingredients: Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*^, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin (Vegetable), Cetrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Glyceryl Caprylate, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Canina Fruit (Rosehip) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Coconut Acid, Acacia Senegal Gum Extract, Tocopherol, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Algae Extract, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend) *Certified Organic Ingredient ^ Fair Trade Ingredient

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Might just add it to my repertoire...
Review: I have been using this for about a month now.  I have used a lot of Shea Moisture products over the years with some good results and some not-so-good results.  I don't wash my hair daily, I have 4c low-poristy hair that requires all the natural oils I have so washing daily it not a good idea.I initially used this as directed as a wash out conditioner.  It was fine, but nothing beats my favorite Giovanni's Smooth as Silk deep moisture conditioner.  But I was out of my leave in and decided to try this in a pinch. It actually works great as a leave on.  I mist my hair in the morning, finger through a small amount of this and go.  I have even used a bigger amount for my twist out.  I have noticed that the hair is more pliable and retains moisture a bit better than my other leave in (another Shea product, ironically).The scent in fine, not too cloying especially if you don't slather on.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: I've been using Shea Moisture products since I went natural several years ago. This conditioner gives your hair the moisture it needs without weighing it down. It leaves hair feeling soft and moisturized. You could also use it as a leave-in. I highly recommend it.Thanks so much for reading this review. I hope the information that I've provided makes your decision a little easier.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Works really well as an "everyday" conditioner
Review: So, the reason I put "everyday" in parenthesis is because I don't wash mine or my daughter's hair everyday. lol However, when I do, this conditioner works really well on her (my daughter's) long, curly hair. Her hair is like a 3a/b curl pattern and it's on the fine side so while I do like to use a deep conditioner at least once every few weeks, I don't like to use them every single time I wash  her hair because i feel it is a bit too much/heavy for her hair imo. This works great on her hair. I've had good luck with shea moisture products on her hair. It's one of my go-tos. I prefer shea moisture over Cantu products any day. The Cantu products are awful and drying on her hair. If you've been using Cantu products and are still struggling with dryness and stuff, I'd recommend trying out shea moisture instead.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I really love this conditioner-the smell is AMAZING! If you love the smell of coconut products, you will love the smell of the conditioner. I don’t know how they get it to smell so good without using artificial fragrance, but it says the fragrance is just essential oils! That’s important, because “fragrances” can have lots of dangerous chemicals added. The smell actually stays in your hair after it’s dried too, which is awesome !I have curly, extremely dry, very frizzy hair. I have to use a deep conditioner every time I wash. Although moisturizing, this conditioner definitely can’t replace my deep conditioners. But it’s not made for that. As a daily conditioner for normal hair, it’s awesome! It didn’t weigh my hair down, it helped with the frizziness, and it smells amazing!! I definitely recommend trying it!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Shea moisture has always been a reputable brand and I've used their products in the past. I used this conditioner as a leave in. I know it wasn't intended for that but I needed something to style my wet hair on short notice. It made my hair manageable to style. I left it in for days and my hair was left feeling visibly soft but it didn't help control the frizz. I later used it to co-wash my hair before a blowout and it made it super easy to detangle. Even after rinsing I was able to blow out my hair easily and it was nearly bone straight so I'd say it helped to really moisturize my hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love all SheaMoisture products and this definitely didn't disappoint.  I have fine thin hair that gets very dry in the  cooler months and this conditioner has definitely helped bring it back to life.  It smells great, not too overwhelming, and provides good moisture without weighing my hair down or making it greasy.  I like the pump top as well.  I use this in combination with their leave-in conditioner and it keeps my hair smooth and shiny.  Great product, would definitely recommend!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is an amazing conditioner and as like many other shea moisture products the coconut scent in this is fantastic.I have thick hair that is coarse in some parts - this conditioner really moisturizer my hair.  Since it contains coconut oil it can feel greasy if you do not rinse this out thoroughly - but when used correctly it leaves the hair soft and manageable and smelling amazing!This is a great product to add moisture to dry hair - I think it is best for thicker coarser hair as it really coats the hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have been using shea moisture products for the passed 5 or 6 years. I have never tried this product until now. My hair type is  colored, very long, dry and curly (frizzy) I usually use the orange labeled product but I think I actually like this one better. The smell is really nice- it smells to me like a salon shampoo/conditioner mixed with coconut. I had to use around 15-20 pumps with my hair type. It made my hair feeling softer and more hydrated! This one overall is probably my favorite product if theirs now!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I came back to update this review to say in the beginning it seemed to be great for my daughter who is mixed (black/white) but her hair started to become really dry and it hadn't been that way before. Only change was switching to this and a couple other products from the line consistently for a while. I've stopped using them and have been using different products for months now and her hair has bounced back.It does smell good, definitely a coconut based scent. The push-down spout is a little slim and with the conditioner being thick when in the shower or at the sink with wet hands it's a little tricky and slick to grasp.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: do not buy!!
Review: I really genuinely thought shea moisture was I good shampoo. I was so excited to use it , but after I used it it left my hair like something was it it. It was as if you melted butter , poured it on you head and let it dry.  And as soon as your hair is dry it starts to look oily. I have very oily hair and thought this would help but I was wrong. Please save your money and do not buy this shampoo! The only good thing was the scent. The scent was amazing though!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: It does not work
Review: My 6 year old has lots of fine, long hair. I purchased this hoping it would be a good quality products and work well. It does not work. My daughter’s hair is still a tangled mess afterwards. I used some dollar store conditioner that I had on hand and it worked better. It wasn’t cheap, so I won’t throw it out. Maybe it will work as a shave lotion…???

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Conditioner rehydrates and softens hair!This conditioner is made with coconut milk and acacia senegal. The coconut oil contains antioxidant vitamin E to nourish hair and natural triglycerides to help hair retain moisture. The coconut milk smooths and softens hair while the acacia senegal locks in moisture to support hair elasticity and suppleness.The best part about this product is that it is non toxic and contains no sulfates, Parabens or mineral oil.I highly recommend this product!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I really like this Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Conditioner. I am mixed with Black and White and have 3b/3c type curly hair. I do my detangling in the shower with lots of conditioner and this is perfect. As much as I have to wash my hair, I needed something that was going to re-hydrate it. The smell is a bit much, but I like how the product works. My local store is usually sold out of this stuff so it's great that I can order it online. Would definitely recommend to keep those curls hydrated!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Good Stuff...
Review: I love this SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Conditioner, 13 Ounce, I have used quite a few of these products. This line I like for my teens color treated, often bleached stressed hair -it needs all the conditioning care it can get. Its great on "ethnic" hair and a little goes a long way. Great product for a fair price-it works as advertised.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This is a creamy conditioner that has a light coconut fragrance. It isn't strong but if I sniff my hair at the end of the day I can detect the scent. It rinses clean and doesn't build up quickly in my hair.It comes in a pump bottle which is perfect for the shower.At the time of this review the retail price was around $8 for a 13 oz bottle which is reasonable for the quality especially since it is Fair Trade certified.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This moisturizer does a great job of moisturizing my face without making it feel greasy or leaving a residue. I’ve tried several different moisturizers, and this is one of my favorites. Hours later my face still does not feel dry. I have super sensitive skin, and this has not caused any issues, including break outs. I recommend it.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Heavenly gardenia pikkake scent!
Review: Not only does it smell absolutely heavenly, it is the best conditioner for my hair. No other softens smooths and shines. I use a variety of their products and this has to be my favorite hands down! The scent and how soft my hair is after use it glorious. I love their daily shampoo as well. Buy the set.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Don’t buy it..
Review: I bought this as it says it helps to rehidrate and help against frizz. Well, it didn’t work at all. It was like if I hadn’t use conditioner at all. I followed the instructions.Besides, it’s expensive for the size of the bottle.I wouldn’t recommend it

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the Virgin Coconut Oil line by Shea Moisture.  I use the products on my daughter's hair and they work like a dream.  This is no exception and it smells delicious.  I also love the pump.  Very moisturizing without weighing hair down with a lot of left over residue.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This conditioner smells like a tropical vacation! I love Sheamoisture products because they have natural ingredients and don't have silicones and waxes to fake your hair looking good. This conditioner is light enough that I've used it as a leave in with great results.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This works really well on my dry curly hair.  I use it as a conditioner in the shower, but also apply a small amount as a leave-in conditioner.  It smells great and leaves my hair soft.  I've gotten a few compliments on how great my hair smells.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like it.  It works better for one of my girls compared to the other, but overall it was moisturizing.  I do like the scent and I've always liked Shea Moisture's quality ingredients.  I think overall its worth trying the product out.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Great size bottle! It is very moisturizing so you don’t need much!! The smell is amazing and it feels so good on the hair! Very shiny and bouncy curls!!!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This conditioner did a good job moisturizing my hair, and my hair felt very soft after using it.On the negative side, I really did not like the scent of this. Also, I had a lot more shedding, both in shower and after use.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Smells like straight fragrance
Review: Very intense fragrance smell. I don't get why they have to load the bottle with so much fragrance given that most of the ingredients are natural and smell great on their own - are they trying to cover something up? I can smell it in my hair days later, and I'm a guy with short hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Waxy reside, stiff, cannot run fingers through
Review: I have tried this product several times and each time I use it, I rinse VERY thoroughly.  My hair is always greasy afterward and stiff.  It’s disgusting- you cannot run your fingers through my hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Lovely light fragrance and makes my curly hair look fabulous! My hair was soft, curly, felt well hydrated without weighing it down. Sulfate free and color safe were also major selling points for me.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I can’t say enough about this kind of haircare... I use a ton of the products because they work so well. Not only do they smell awesome, but they moisturize your hair without any greasy residue.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Love the entire line- love the hydration
Review: This product is great for hydration. It does not do much more for my hair than that, however. If my hair is dry and brittle, this is a quick fix but does not last long.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Love this!
Review: I have thick, fine hair and suffer from Psoriatic dermatitis, so I have to use prescription shampoo that is very drying and steroid foam that is very greasy. This conditioner has improved the condition of my hair, helps detangle in the shower so I am seeing less hair fall, and has even made my gray hair more manageable (recently decided to stop covering my gray..) and soft. Love this product!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Definitely does not detangle hair
Review: This is one if the worst conditioners I’ve ever used. I think it actually dries my hair out and makes it more tangled. It’s impossible to brush my hair after I use this.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: FAVORITE! Love the scent! Lasts all day!  Helps keep you from getting tangled while washing!
Review: Heavenly scent! And if you have tangly hair this will help keep it untangled while washing.  It smells sooooooo good!  I keep sniffing my hair all day long! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: The best cruelty free conditioner I’ve used yet!
Review: My hair is very thick, pretty unruly and usually hard to manage.  This conditioner has been a lifesaver.  I only use beauty and bath products that are safe and never tested on animals.  That limits a lot of brands for me and and I’m usually left disappointed when it comes to conditioner.  Shea has been the best I’ve ever used.  I don’t need a huge amount (two pumps is just fine and my hair is pretty long), The price is perfect, no animals are harmed and I love the scent!  My hair is left shiny and way easier to manage after each use.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This conditioner is my new favorite in the SheaMoisture product line. I love their products.My hair feels so soft after washing with it and no greasy feeling at all.My hair is very thick and finding a conditioner to work can be difficult (some don't work at all and others make it greasy feeling/looking).I will buy this again.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Does not help moisturize my hair
Review: It smells great and the ingredients are good but it really doesn't moisturize my hair or scalp at all. Kind of a let down

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Not worth the $
Review: Useless

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: I have long (over half way down my back), curly, thick hair, and I really really wanted to love this product, but it just doesn't work for me. It feels like I need a lot of it, and feels a little... dry (??) when I'm putting it into my hair.I've tried once with a lot of product, and it just made my roots really greasy really quickly, and my hair frizzy. I tried a second time with less product, but my hair felt really dry in the shower, and dried frizzy again, which I don't have as a problem with other conditioners normally.I really really wanted to love this, and it does smell amazing!! I just don't think it works for my hair type :(

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: 100% will buy again now added to my staple products to replace  ORS rinse out Avacado  conditoner 4A 4b hair. Good for a mid week cleanse

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Quick delivery however my picture is hows how I received the product. The box is undamaged but the pump doesn't work and it looks to have leaked. Not as much as what is missing from the bottle.. I would like a refund! Thanks

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Love this product, I have naturally curly Afro hair and have been using this for a while.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Smells like coconut. Got rid of my tangles and frizz and left my hair moisturised and smooth <3

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Love this product and I am a repeated purchaser.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Very good product.  The fragrance is beautiful too. Makes its so easy to comb my hair after washing it.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Suited my hair

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Suaviza,pero no excesivamente, a mí me funciona bien aunque no te dejé el pelo tan sedoso con el lavado, después de lavarlo y secarlo queda bien.Editado 04/01/20: después de bastante uso con él, a mí me funciona mejor no aclararlo, tengo el pelo bastante seco y a mí no me suaviza si no lo hago así, con el enjuagado ni lo noto.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Para mi ha sido una total decepción. Esperaba notar el cambio con este acondicionador pero no ha sido así. No hay nada que lo diferencie de cualquier otro acondicionador de 3 euros. El pelo sigue quedando encrespado, nada suave y poco hidratado.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: vino sin ningún tipo de precinto, lo que genera rechazo, hasta podría estar usado. no sé si vienen todos así, pero un producto cosmético siempre ha de haber garantía. primera impresión, mal. todavía está por ver su eficacia.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: This conditioner smells AMAZING!! I am already noticing a difference after using this and the shampoo after 2 washes! My hair is softer and smells nice for 2-3 days! The only downside is that it is hard to tell how much conditioner is in your hair and where. I always feel more confident if I can feel the conditioner in my hair!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Absolutely love this conditioner! I paired it with Shea  moisturizer deep cleansing black shampoo. My hair are dense and long so I totally recommend this pairing if you have similar condition! I have not applied anything to my hair in this pictures, just dried with hair dryer :)

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Compre el shampoo y acondicionador por el prestigio de la marca y la necesidad de hidratar mi cabello pero al término mi cabello queda muy enredado, lejos de suavidad y brillantez

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: I want to start off by saying I really love what the brand represents and the history behind the brand. However, my hair has never looked so greasy after a shower.... my roots look even dirtier and greasier than before I showered.  My ends were super dry after use as well. Really wish this product worked for me, but it clearly does not. I would not recommend buying if you have long thick hair.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Llevo pocos días usándolo pero da mucha hidratación y suavidad, ojo con la cantidad, me da la sensación que puede engrasar (sobretodo zona de la raíz) pero el resto, genial. Y huele, que dan ganas de comérselo. De momento genial. Además, sus ingredientes son sostenibles, biodegradables y no irritan.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Not the best product from Shea Moisture. I prefer their retention line. This doesn't really smell like coconut. It's kinda strange. Better for straight hair, I think

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Shea moisture es mi marca favorita de productos para el pelo y hasta ahora todos me funcionaban muy bien. Este acondicionador no se comparan con otros que he usado y lo siento muy aceitoso. Lo acabaré y probaré otro de la marca

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Ha un INCI ottimo, mi piace molto il profumo dolce che rimane anche dopo l’asciugatura e lascia i capelli molto morbidi. Ho un riccio 3A che si increspa facilmente, lo uso insieme al gel d’aloe per lo styling e mi sembra mantenga abbastanza l’effetto. Lo ricomprerò sicuramente

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: This is one of the best conditioners I have ever used. Now that it's getting into the colder weather my hair becomes dry and almost brittle feeling like straw. I used this for the first time and my hair came out like silk! And with my hair being fine to boot it didn't weigh it down either. Would highly recommend!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Me gusta para cowash, ya que es apto para el método curly, no es un producto que de sensación de pesadez y huele muy bien

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: It's...I don't like coconut oil in general so it didn't work for me. It really depends on your hair type. I'm sure it's wonderful but for my hair it didn't like it.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Tiene buen aroma, pero muy Graso tanto el producto como el acabado que deja en el cabello. No he visto cambio en suavidad.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Consegnato nei tempi previsti... Ottimo prodotto per i capelli kinky 4c dona morbidezza e idratazione senza appesantirli... Definisce bene il riccio... Ottimo prodotto lo ricomprero sicuramente

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydrating Conditioner For All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil For All Hair Types Daily Hydration Finishing Oil Serum Silicone-Free 4.1 oz
Title: Best Hair Oil
Review: I can make my own hair oil but I was traveling and needed something in a leak proof packaging and this came wrapped in a plastic baggie. It’s mostly all natural oils with a little bit of fragrance and I use it bc I have 2b-3a hair and I use the co-wash method and my hair is very long. The ends get cry dry. I’m in Hawaii for work and I find that this smell and the moisture factor makes this oil my favorite commercially made, curly girl approved oil for post washing. I add a teeny bit to my roots and I work this into my hair as I brush it out, let air dry or wrap into a protective hair style like braids or twists after I wash it. On non-wash days I use a little bit on my ends and on my flyaways. It leaves it very shiny.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil For All Hair Types Daily Hydration Finishing Oil Serum Silicone-Free 4.1 oz

Review: I love the product but I've had two sent to me and both of them have been somehow the top is loose and the oil has spilled out into the bag. Not a very nice presentation but it's a great product

Title: Great product but...
Review: Great product but when I had received it, it was open, oil was leaking out of it and it was held way done. I am not sure why it was poorly packaged but that is why I am giving it one star. I am hoping no one else went through that. It was a mess.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil For All Hair Types Daily Hydration Finishing Oil Serum Silicone-Free 4.1 oz
Title: Delivered LEAKING & DAMAGED
Review: Leaking through bottle, and through the bag, and even through the Amazon BOX it was delivered in. Leaked oil all over my mail.  Otherwise it was as described.When I opened the bag, I found that the top of the bottle was unscrewed. Lost half the bottle of oil. Try putting a plastic seal around the top like other fluid products, or maybe a seal on top when you first open it. Had this had a seal, and the bottle came unscrewed upon delivery, it probably would not have leaked all over my mail.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil For All Hair Types Daily Hydration Finishing Oil Serum Silicone-Free 4.1 oz
Title: Serum spilled in packaging
Review: I just received this today so I can’t attest to the product itself except that it smells amazing! The lid was not screwed on tightly so part of the serum was in the bag (thankful for the bag) and, therefore all over the bottle. It’s a stocking stuffer so I had to clean the bottle before I could wrap it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100 percent Virgin Coconut Oil For All Hair Types Daily Hydration Finishing Oil Serum Silicone-Free 4.1 oz
Title: Decent
Review: This is a nice product. It has a straight stream, not a spray, so covers less surface area. The fragrance subtle. I might buy it again.

This oil serum is one of the greatest. My hair love it! It hydrates, add shine and shortness to my hair. I would have bought another if the seller would change the shipping settings. Last time I could order but now unfortunately I can’t.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Great eco friendly shampoo on a budget
Review: FIRST TIME USERS PLEASE READ:Bar shampoo that is natural takes time for you hair to adapt to, especially if you were using shampoos with sulfates before. It takes about a month for your hair basically to detox and then the softness you get is beyond imaginable. Use vinegar, water, and rosemary rinses one a week or couple times a month as a complimentary conditioner. Also, you have to brush the oil from your scalp down your hair to distribute the beneficial oils your scalp produces. If not, the hair was n the scalp can seem oily. It is extra work but better for the environment and health.I love this brand in general. This was the first time using their bar shampoo. It’s a great smell. I have short hair so it will last me probably 3 months. I’m still detoxing from using a different shampoo before because I switched back to bottle shampoo which I know is a waste of money. I use this shampoo on my 1 year olds hair and it looks and feels so lush afterwards. I switched her to bar shampoo too because even the natural baby shampoo were drying out her hair a little more than I liked even though I don’t want it everyday.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Exceeded expectations...
Review: I was afraid to try this so for months I continued using liquid shampoo. It's been three washes now (I use it on my scalp and condition the ends) and I am blown away. Typically I wash my fine 1A hair every other day because the roots become oily, not with this product. I also have less shedding than when I use traditional liquid shampoo. Don't get me wrong, your hair feels quite different while rinsing in the shower and as it dries than when using traditional liquid shampoo but the results have been increased volume and shine. I will return with an update and picture soon!

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Awful
Review: I bought this for travel while out of the country. I am in quarantine for 2 weeks and it's only day 4 and my hair is heavy and greasy after using this product. The more you use it the worse the build up. It doesn't rinse out.  I am so disappointed. I look like a street rat hobo and still have 10 more days until I can get something else to wash this crap out. Do mot even think about buying this crap. You will regret it I promise.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Worst Shampoo Bar Ever.
Review: This is hands down the worst shampoo bar I have ever tried. I used it twice.. and I regret it terribly. The first time I used it my hair felt strange, unmanageable and sort of gritty. I tried it one more time and it only got worse. I have now washed my hair twice in two showers (four times) and there is a still a weird residue in some parts of my hair. It was a complete waste of money and my hair is in horrible condition. I used their recommendation based on my hair type on their website. I was between a 1A and 1C and this bar was recommended for both. This is incredibly disappointing because I love their other products and their company.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Switch to bars!
Review: Very cleaning and moisturizing shampoo bar. It doesn’t have an overwhelming scent, and really lets my hair feel natural and not weighed down. It lasts a lot longer than shampoo bottles too.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Awesome Shampoo!
Review: I have alopecia and don’t have any hair on my head. This awesome little bar lathers right up and moisturizes. I’ve been using these bars for years and not only are they travel friendly, but they actually work!!

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: My favorite solid shampoo bar
Review: The smell is incredible! I love it. I've been using solid shampoo for years and this one washes and rinses more like a liquid shampoo than the other bars I've used. My hair is straight and fine and tends to get greasy fast. If I use this bar alone, I only shampoo about 2-3 times per week.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Horribly drying.
Review: Extraordinary drying. Suitable only as laundry soap.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: It’s like soap
Review: Although the main function of the shampoo is to clean, if you have long hair and like moisture, this is not the product for you. If you like a very clean result, then you will get it. This shampoo bar cleans great, but you will need conditioner afterwards so it doesn’t leave you with dry hair.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Wanted to love it, bad fit for me.
Review: I love the smell and the size of this shampoo bar, as well as how it leathers up. However, it has left a clay-like residue all over my hair that is very dulling and it makes my scalp itch.I have well-nourished (oily) hair.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Great shampoo bar.
Review: I have wavy hair on the thicker side and this bar worked great. It left my hair very soft and moisturized. Using a shampoo brush also really helped with removing any residual product left in scalp.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Made hair greasy
Review: I really wanted to love this. It smells wonderful and I generally like the products from this company. However, this shampoo made my hair incredibly greasy. Greasy as in it looked and felt like I hadn’t showered in days greasy. I thought maybe I didn’t wash it out well, but even after a couple more uses and extra rinsing, it didn’t get any better.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Nice
Review: I have no complaints. Smells good. Cleans my hair. It was very large.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Best soap for shaving your head
Review: That is the best soap I have ever used to shave my head.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Great product
Review: Love! Environmentally friendly and makes my hair shine.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Drying
Review: Stripped my hair

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Great but not for my hair
Review: I love this...as a face soap. Not for the hair. It made my hair look like I hadn’t showered for a few days. This might not be a bad thing, it might actually be moisturizing it? In any case, I used this as a face soap and I love it for that, I will probably cut it into quarters for travel. It certainly doesn’t dry out my skin. I don’t hate it, I just don’t like it as a shampoo. The coconut scent is very light. I like that there is no plastic!

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Shampu en barra. Fragancia a coco!
Review: Hace bien limpio el cuero cabelludo. En verdad me gusto y es facil de aplicar, huele delicioso. Super para llevar. Me gustan productos de shea moisture mucho. Lo recomiendo. Es mejor!

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Best shampoo bar I've tried yet!
Review: I've tried about 5 different brands/types of shampoo bars, and this is by far my favorite. It doesn't leave my hair gritty or waxy, it does a good job at removing oil, it works up into a lather so you know when you've used enough product, AND I don't even need conditioner after it because it is so hydrating!

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Felt wonderful from the first moment.
Review: I like the bar better than. Bottle. My hair immediately responded to this shampoo the moment I started rubbing it into my hair.  This method seems to get my hair cleaner faster and delivered moisture to my scalp quickly. Love it.

Product: 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Clay Shampoo Bar, 4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)
Title: Leaves hair sticky
Review: Nice concept but leaves my hair sticky.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: changed ingredients to toxic ones---
Review: Phenoxyethanol is so high up in the ingredient list. I bought this specific shampoo because the photo shows ingredients without it. It didn’t say Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend) anymore. Phenoxyethanol causes central nervous system damage in exposed infants, and it’s human carcinogenic. Phenoxyethanol causes adverse effects on the brain and nervous systems.This chemical is okay-ish for adults but is advised not to use on infants...It sucks because other than a super toxic ingredient, I really loved this shampoo. She smelled like an angel baby.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Irritates baby's eyes!
Review: This product moisturized my son's hair but I have to ask at what cost. His eyes were red and burning due to the "natural ingredients." Products labeled for "babies" must be tear free.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Scam
Review: Purchased a set of 3, only received one! Deceitful.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Not as advertised
