Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Changed formula, do not buy
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   ((EDIT: I JUST NOTICED THE INGREDIENTS HAVE COMPLETELY CHANGED AND I WILL NO LONGER PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.))I was gifted a bottle of this baby wash at my baby shower and I am so grateful because, let me just say that our kid is almost 3 now and still using this stuff exclusively. It smells heavenly, is gentle, leaves her super curly hair soft and manageable, AND it has replaced my face wash completely! Like, I won't wash my face and makeup off with anything else, this stuff is pure gentle magic! I'm actually here to buy more bottles right now. Buy it!

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Great Wash
Review: This shampoo and body wash works really well. My child's hair is shiny and tangle free. It works better than Johnson and Johnson and the Dove product I tried for my baby. The scent is really pleasing too. I highly recommend this.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Very satisfied customer and mother of 3!!!
Review: This product is absolutely perfect! I have a baby girl and 2 baby boys, all of them with long hair. This is the only thing I use to wash their hair with. You only need a little bit of it and it lathers alot. It has a nice soft scent, it's perfect for sensitive babies. Also it leave their hair very soft and shiny.I give this product 10 star

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: FAKE. DONT BUY
Review: This item is fake & it’s really not a joke as it’s for baby’s. THANK GOODNESS I still had some of the real shampoo left & instantly seen it wasn’t the real product. Color of liquid & bottle label is completely different. This is absolutely horrible

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Disappointed Bad stuff Phenoxyethanol and unknown fragrance
Review: Yikes. Phenoxyethanol is so high up in the ingredient list. So disappointed that the item now contains the bad stuff Phenoxyethanol and unknown fragrance. It didn’t say Fragrance (Essential Oil Blend) anymore. Phenoxyethanol cause central nervous system damage in exposed infants, and it’s human carcinogenic. Phenoxyethanol cause adverse effects on the brain and nervous systems.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Rashes & irritates eyes
Review: After 1 month of use, this started giving my daughter rashes all over her belly. Had to discontinue use. Smells weird, also. A scent that smells like glue or old hair gel. Definitely irritates babies eyes. My daughter whined a lot when it would run down her face as I was washing it out of her hair. Not a good product. Left her hair very dry, too. Burts bees baby product was better and did not hurt my baby’s eyes or skin.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Suffocating Old Lady Smell
Review: I was excited to finally get this because it was recommended by MamaNatural and I'd been looking for a natural baby wash. Unfortunately, I expected it to be rather scentless...and the Sweat Pea fragrance in it is overbearing. Should have read the description better. I accidentally got a little on my finger while removing the safety seal and now it is all I can smell. Maybe I'm just sensitive to that but the sweat pea is STRONG and I don't want my baby smelling like an old lady who put too much lotion on.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells great and works awesome.
Review: I’m an adult and I use this for me! I found this by accident in our local discount grocery store. I loved the smell so much I had to get it. I won’t use anything else now. It’s pretty perfect. Lathers good and leaves skin smelling amazing and soft.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Not filled to brim
Review: Maybe this is a normal amount but it seemed like it was lacking a little bit of soap at the top as if someone had emptied some of it out. It still had the protective thing under the cap but I couldn't tell for sure if it had been previously used or tested out by someone else before it came to me. This isn't exactly a review of the product but more so the seller or manufacturer because I just felt like the bottle should have been more fully filled.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells Great
Review: I use this on my new born. I wanted to switch it up from the dove head to toe I used on my other kiddo in hope that it doesn’t dry out her African American hair when it thickens out. I love the Dove head to toe but I felt like it dried my first kids hair out (3c/4a type). This smells really good and doesn’t seem to bother her skin. I use this paired with coconut oil and so far so good. Oh yea, did i mention how much I love the smell of this stuff?

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Softness and definition!
Review: I am never using anything else to wash my daughter's hair.  The softness of her hair after I wash it is amazing...not to mention the definition! Having gone through a few different products, I can honestly say that this is by far the best!

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Not for people with chemical allergies
Review: I have serious problems with chemicals.  Just opening up the top made me light headed and sick.  It may be a good product for someone who is not so allergic.  I gave it to a friend who said she could use it.  If you have MCS, like me, don't buy it.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Very soft hair and skin
Review: I generally like shea moisture products for its gentleness. This worked very well on my daughter’s hair. It made it very soft and shiny. I like it more than dove and johnson & johnson. I would recommend it.I dont know why reviews are talking about 3 bottles. I see only 1 bottle and got 1 bottle.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Wasnt a fan of the smell
Review: This is my first time trying this product and itll honestly be my last. For the price i dont feel that its worth buying. I do not like the smell. The thickness of it is nice. It always looks and comes out like honey. The packaging was good. But this particular scent is just not for me.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Ammonia Smell
Review: I’m not sure what has changed.. I ordered this product for the first time several months  ago and LOVED it. It smelled amazing, and left my skin smooth. I went to reorder and was sent a product that smelled off. I would describe it as ammonia. Amazon sent me a replacement and though it has less of the ammonia smell, it is nothing like the first time I ordered in terms of scent. Everything else (texture, moisturizing) is the same. I’m super bummed because I’m expecting in May and wanted to use this for our little one. Now I won’t be ordering again.

Product: SheaMoisture Baby Wash and Shampoo for Baby 100% Virgin Coconut Oil, 13 Fl Oz
Title: Smells good in a strong way
Review: Good stuff but overwhelming odor that smells clean and is apparently natural. Just beware there is a strong scent if you are sensitive.

A buyer commented that the formula changed so I went to see for myself and it’s true.

I also use the Shea moisture coconut oil on her hair for extra lovely looking curls

Title: Game changer

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Sticky Residue
Review: I wanted to like this product because I really like the lotion and am trying to be more conscious about the safety of the products we use. But I just didn't. It required three washings in the shower just to get my hair feeling sort of clean and then it left a sticky residue in my hair that made it so heavy and greasy I had to wash it again the next day - which I never do. Once it was dry, I couldn't even run my fingers through it and by the next day it looked like it had been dipped in grease. For reference, I have normal to oily wavy hair that I usually wash about every 3 days.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Not what I expected
Review: I used this product for a few days, and then I swiftly returned it. It's terrible and misleading. It presents itself as a "100% virgin coconut oil product", but the major ingredient in it is shea butter. Just check the back of the label. In fact, it has way too much raw shea butter in there. It WILL weigh down your hair, and it takes forever to wash it out of your scalp.  Also, it left a terrible smell behind for days.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: So worth giving it a chance!
Review: I love this product. The shampoo alone is great but combined with the conditioner, the results are amazing! My hair is smoother,  shinier and less dry looking. I have baby fine hair so it is hard to find a product that hydrates, but doesn't weigh my hair down. Here it is! I am so glad that I gave it a chance. So worth the price. I just wish the shampoo came in a pump bottle like the conditioner, and that the bottles were bigger.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Worst ever!!!
Review: This is the worst conditioner and shampoo I’ve ever used in my entire life. It leaves a very thick residue on your hair and leaves your hair feeling dirty and greasy immediately after showering. 0/10 would NOT recommend.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Absolutely Amazing Hair Product!
Review: This is a wonderful hair product for the entire family. We have a 3.5 year old and it's great for him as well as my husband, and my own hair. My hair is color treated and yet I never have color fade from it. Our hair is left soft, clean, feels weightless, without oily residue AND there is the benefit of knowing I'm not subjecting my little one or myself to any harmful ingredients. For me personally, being that I already subject myself to coloring my hair, I feel better that I am not adding to unnecessarily with harmful chemicals in my haircare products. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Disappointed this time around
Review: This is my second time ordering the coconut oil blend (which smells amazing and does wonders for my hair) but I have been ordering Shea Moisture products for two years now. It is my go to brand and I have never had any issues until today. My package was completely busted open and the shampoo was poured out into the package all over the two bottles themselves . Not only was it a mess to clean up but more than half of the shampoo was gone, at the price I'm paying I am not happy at all.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Gentle and effective.
Review: I finally found a product that isn’t too expensive that doesn’t make my hair super frizzy or difficult to brush. And about a week after I began using it, my dandruff stopped and my hair quit falling out.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: I bought for the Coconut smell and it doesn't smell nothing like Coconut to me.
Review: I just started using so I don't know if it helps my hair or not. I have long hair down to my waist line. First if all, the bottles are small. Especially, the condinter bottle. So, another words you will run out of condinter before the shampoo. The other thing I live the smell of coconut and anything that reminds me of the beach and sun. I bought because it said "Coconut Oil". Instead of my hair smelling like Coconut, I feel like my hair smells like I just got out of a salon getting my hair permed. It stinks!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: the combo is the best!
Review: The twosome is a really great value.  It lasts a long time. I originally bought the 32 oz size which lasted me an entire year.  You only need to use about a quarter size of the shampoo and the conditioner.  Was never big on conditioners.  They felt like I just put dirt on my hair.  Always used only shampoos.  Amway sold a really great shampoo & conditioner and then stopped selling it.  So on to search for something similar and a good conditioner that I liked.  I'm very picky about shampoos and conditioners.I have thick shoulder length hair.  Live in Arizona so summers are hot, winters so so. Need shampoos that work well in hot and colder weather.  Luv the SheaMoisture.Leaves the hair very manageable, even the conditioner takes majority of tangles out of the wet hair when running a comb thru it first or blow drying then putting comb thru it.Learned long time ago from a few beautitioners that the shampoo doesn't need to be sudsy to make it clean.  That's a gimmick sales people use to sell their shampoos.  Only need a small amount of shampoo in the palm of the hand to wash the hair with.  Don't use hot water, use warm water.  Hot water will dry the hair out.  Conditioner, don't use a ton of conditioner.  Only use a small amount in palm of hand and gently rub into the hair.  Leave on for few minutes before rinsing.  Same with water temperature.  Use Warm not hot so as not to dry hair out.Do not use high temp on hair dryer when drying hair either.  It will dry the hair out.  Doesn't matter if short, medium length, or long hair, all the same.  Shorter hair use even less shampoo and Conditioner.Was reading some of the reviews from people who called this product worse ever.  They apparently don't know anything about how to wash ones hair or they are a competitors brand.  I have oily hair so I buy the one that suits all types of hair.Shea Moisture does make different shampoos/conditions for different types of hair - oily, dry, hard to manage, straight, curly, etc.  Make sure to buy one that suits your hair type and don't worry if you're not seeing a lot of lather like you think you should.  Lots of lather means absolutely nothing.  Just means takes longer to rinse out.I do recommend this shampoo and is a good deal for the money.  I pd high prices for expensive shampoos/conditioners that were horrible even from beauty salons.  They're just wanting to sell their product(s).  Some have good products.  just don't get hung up on name brands and pricing.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Perfect for a clean and soft hair and for kids too!
Review: I use this product for my 8 yr old daughter. Other kids shampoos would leave her hair dry. I went Sulfate-free, Paraben-free route and it’s helped so much. We use to purchase the JASON coconut one and it seemed so hard to find or too pricey. My daughter loves this one because it also has the coconut scent which is very pleasant and it leaves her fine straight hair so clean and soft. Bottle last a while since it’s just for her to.  I definitely recommend it.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: better than expected
Review: I have really thin and soft hair with oily roots and drier ends. It's frustrating to find the right shampoo because my hair is trouble. Can you imagine having oily roots/hair on top but then fuzzy and dry hair on the bottom? I was a bit skeptical when my friend recommended the shampoo because I thought the coconut oil was going to make my roots oilier than it already is. After the first few washes, I didn't really like the texture of it. My hands were greasy after applying the shampoo to my hair and it took a few washes to get rid of the residues just on my hands. It takes much longer to rinse my hair after each application. I also noticed that I tend to loose more hair during wash for the first 2 weeks. I decided to stick with it for at least a month because I noticed some surprising results. My roots are a lot drier. My hair is a lot puffier. I love the dryness and volume that it added to my hair. I usually wash my hair once every 2 days and it's usually oily and flat by the middle of day 2, but this shampoo can last me 3 days. My roots do feel oily by touch on day 3, but my hair still looks dry and puffy. By week 3, I started loosing less hair during wash (like A LOT LESS). The shampoo + condition combo also kicked in, my hair is a lot less fuzzy towards the ends. By the end of week 3 and the beginning of week 4, I also noticed a lot of new growth along my hairline. I have really thin hair so I was able to easily spot the new/shorter hair sticking out. I don't know if the shampoo was supposed to aid in hair growth, but that's what's happening with mine now (I can't speak for anyone else obviously).The only thing that I didn't like about the shampoo is probably how "greasy" it feels like. Sometimes I am just not sure if I completely rinse off everything. It does feel like I didn't wash it well enough at times when I touch my hair while it's still dam, but it feels perfectly fine after my hair dries. I gave it 4/5 because of this. In general, the shampoo works great for me. My hair is less oily, less fuzzy, and more puffier. I also like the subtle coconut scent. I recommended it to my family as well and so far, they seem to like it as well.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Leavea lots of residue
Review: I do not recommend buying this product. I've been using it for about 2 weeks straight. I wash my hair everyday so I thought I would buy something for everyday use. This leaves so much residue I feel my hair getting sticky and heavy. It doesn't clean through.

Title: Moisture

I love that its got a lot of natural ingredients but i can’t imagine that its moisturizing for afro hair if my 1B hair doesn't feel the most moisturized.Im going to keep using it for a couple weeks and will update if my review changes

I'm not a fan of the coconut smell but this just smells fresh to me. Great buy. Buying more of the Shea Moisture products!!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Works great, I rebuy this stuff all the time
Review: I have rarely been a second-time buyer for shampoo and conditioner separately, let alone as a package deal. I bought the big bottles of this shampoo/conditioner at Costco and when I ran out, I immediately ordered them off Amazon because other shampoos and conditioners were just not the same! I rarely style my fine, slightly wavy hair And like to keep it as moisturized and healthy as possible. This shampoo is so nourishing and not harsh with cleansing, it will not give you that stripped squeaky clean feel. And the conditioner is ultra rich and does wonders to flatten out any frizz and seal and coat the hair cuticle for shine. I love this product.I noticed in other reviews some people complain of an oily/residue like substance on your scalp. This shampoo isn’t a harsh cleanser so that’s likely from buildup around your sebum glands and hair follicles. Try a clarifying shampoo or apple cider vinegar rinse before you use these products and that could help them work to your liking.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Worst shampoo on planet earth. Beware!
Review: This is literally the worst shampoo I've ever used. I bought it at Sam's club, but had to come warn people about it here....it's THAT bad. I haven't tried the conditioner so can't comment on that. But the shampoo doesn't make your hair feel clean at all. In fact, it makes it feel MORE dirty after you wash....like it leaves some kind of sticky residue in your hair. It also leaves it feeling so weighed down and greasy but also dried out at the same time. It honestly reminds me of how my hair feels if I have used a lot of sticky products or haven't washed it in days. I guess maybe it works for some hair types, but I absolutely hated it. I seriously used it one time and am too scared to even try it again. And I am not someone who is picky about these things. I don't think I've ever truly disliked a shampoo before. For the record, I have pretty normal wavy hair. More on the thick side with drier ends and a somewhat oily scalp.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Hair left feeling greasy and heavy!!!!!!!!
Review: I bought mine from walmart and I've always loved Shea Moisture products. I went to the review section to see if anyone else had the problem I've had. I used to use the shea moisture protein shampoo and the daily moisturizer conditioner. I recently switched to the moisture shampoo and kept the conditioner and it's been hell ever since.No matter how long in in the shower or how much I put in my hair, it leaves my hair feeling stiff, greasy, hard to comb through, almost like I didnt wash anything out of my hair. I've used alot and I've used a little and it is always the same result.My hair is naturally frizzy and wavy and straight and curly and damaged. My hair is pretty crazy and I've been desperately searching for a routine that makes my hair happy, but this stuff ain't it. This product might work for you. But if you have hair like mine, you might want to look somewhere else.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Sticky residue
Review: I bought the shampoo at Costco hoping it would tame my dry frizzy hair.  Posting here since I read the reviews to see if this is a common problem, and sounds like I'm not alone.  I washed with it the first time, and I thought maybe I forgot to rinse my hair because my hair felt sticky and greasy after it dried.  So I tried again and made sure I rinsed really well.  Same result...so sticky that my fingers get stuck when I try to comb through.  I can't wear a ponytail because my roots look so greasy.  The pump also didn't work. Very disappointed.  Maybe the conditioner is better.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Worst shampoo ever!
Review: This shampoo requires a great amount  to get a lather, which is what the directions direct you to do. Unfortunately it left my hair dry and sticky. The second time I tried, I used less. My hair is not as sticky but appears to be supper dry, and it’s difficult to get the comb through. I feel I lose more hair every time I comb it. It is called everyday shampoo because you have to wash your hair everyday because the shampoo makes it feel dirty every day, not because it is okay to use it every day and not damage your hair. If you love the sticky, tangly, dry, dirty feel to your hair, you’ll love this shampoo!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Did not work for me at all
Review: I have virgin 2C/3A coarse and medium porosity hair that tends to become frizzy a lot. This shampoo and conditioner did nothing for my hair. I had wash it 4 times for the shampoo to somewhat clean my hair. And I still felt a sticky residue after I rinsed it out. The conditioner felt nice but again it was a struggle to rinse out. After I blow dried, my hair felt weighed down, dull and extremely frizzy. I will not be purchasing this product again.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: In love
Review: I went to the store maybe two weeks ago and bought the shampoo alone. It was pretty expensive but I’m a sucker for coconut shampoo and I wanted to try something new. I really was not expecting such an amazing product. Since the I have gotten the conditioner, the body lotion, the body wash, another lotion, and already have some other products from them in mind. All through out every single one is a winner.The shampoo leaves my hair super soft the point I didn’t even think it needed conditioner. The conditioner leaves it even softer but not greasy. Smells great, affordable, organic, what is not to love?I’m a man, with curly hair, I keep a medium length hair style and also use the shampo & conditioner on my beard.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Use this with another stronger shampoo
Review: More of a tip than a review. I got it from whole foods initially without checking review or anything, and at first I ran into the same problem with a lot of the reviewers here. My hair is slightly oily that gets greasy in a day and a half. This shampoo made my hair go greasy in a day (or less?). So after getting another shampoo that was way stronger and dried my scalp out (fyi it was one of lush shampoo bars, i think they are really strong in general) I decided to put this on after the first wash as it seemed to coat my hair with something, and now my hair goes greasy in two days--way longer than what it used to be if i use any shampoo by itself. My speculation is that there is something about this shampoo that coats your hair rather than degrease it completely (hence "hydrating"), so you should pair it up with a stronger one if you find this too heavy for your taste. If you do that, this shampoo is really worth it. I change my shampoo almost every bottle but this routine is so golden that I'm not willing to experiment for a while now. And the scent is lovely if you like coconut.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Yuk.
Review: Left my hair tacky and limp.  Also stiff.  Couldn't run my fingers through my hair.  Yuk!!  Had to wash with Suave the next day.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: I had to use it to shave my legs to at least not have it go to waste…
Review: I have long medium-thick hair. OMG the struggle to try and wash it all out! YUCK. After hours when my hair was all dry, it left my hair feeling nasty and greasy. It was like I didn’t wash it all out in the shower! Awful shampoo!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Induced Hair Loss
Review: I'm not sure why Shea Moisture has this effect on my hair... It makes it soft and hydrated, but causes balding if used for a long period of time (or at least in my case).  My 3b/3a hair falls out with each wash or if detangling when using this product. It doesn't matter what line I use from the brand. I even make sure to use a clarifying shampoo every other week. Shea Moisture is NOT THE ONLY BRAND THAT DOES THIS. I'm sure you've heard Deva Curl? I'm only writing this review because I wanted to share that THE ONLY SHAMPOO that did not cause my to hair fall out while washing was  Innersense Organics. The problem is it's so expensive. But if you look it up on the Think Dirty App, it has the cleanest rating out of all of the curly hair shampoos; And YES  it leaves your hair soft and weightless. The cost and quantities is the only downside.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Good product but not for fine hair
Review: I like this brand because it is all natural and I bought the daily shampoo thinking that it will take back my waves as described by CG gurls that used but it gives me a lot of weight in my hair (fine hair and low porosity) and I do not recommend if you have those characteristics. It left  me a feeling on my hair like I did not wash it out and my scalp started with a very itchy feeling.After using a clarifier my hair is better.Maybe I will try the weightless shampoo from same brand.Hope this helps!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: DO NOT BUY
Review: DO NOT BUY THIS, by far the worst shampoo I’ve ever used (I’ve used so many different brands I obsess over shampoo) even the hotel shampoo is better than this. This left my hair feeling like I haven’t washed it in 2 months, very dry and sticky. Almost felt like I put Shea butter and left it sitting in for a day or 2! In other words, I was very disappointed!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Leaves residue/product in your hair
Review: I tried this after using the Orlando Pita argan glass shampoo for years and I immediately hated it. My hair was weighed down with product that did not wash out. I washed with a tea tree shampoo the next day and tried again later on. Still hate it.It makes your hair feel yucky.I have thick  brown wavy hair.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: WORST SHAMPOO I"VE EVER PURCHASED
Review: DO NOT BUY unless you have extremely curly hair. It says all hair types but that is not the case, and I honestly wouldn't recommend it even for curly hair. No matter how well you rinse it out, it leaves this disgusting feeling film ALL THROUGH your hair. My hair literally feels like I've been stranded out in the wilderness for months after coming out of the SHOWER. It's not hydrating, it's GREASY. The conditioner is fine, nothing special.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: This made my hair look so much healthier!
Review: After using this for only a month I’ve seen a huge difference! I used to use Head and Shoulders, which damaged my hair a lot. This has added so much moisture to my hair and I don’t exactly love the scent but I don’t mind it. If you’re on the fence, definitely give it a try!

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: softness
Review: I have been using this shampoo for a couple of years, I rarely use the conditioner because my hair doesn't tangle up with the shampoo.  I like the scent and my hair stays clean for about 3 days. I don't like to shampoo to often because my hair is thining.  After using regular shampoo my scalp starts to itch and with Shea Butter shampoo it doesn't.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Great product!
Review: I have fine wavy white hair (I’m in my late 50s) and I endeavor to follow the curly girl method. This shampoo left my hair soft, shiny, bouncy. Yes, I rinsed thoroughly, as you should. No, it’s not going to create billows of suds, but I had plenty of lather. It’s sulfate-free. Use sulfates if you want sudsy, squeaky clean dried out, stripped hair that you don’t  rinse well.

Review: I bought my 100% virgin coconut oil daily hydration conditioner at Costco on sale for $12 & it is the worst conditioner I’ve ever tried. I have long hair and it’s very straight and shiny and I found this conditioner to be no good…so back to Costco it goes.

Product: SheaMoisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Daily Hydration Shampoo & Conditioner | 13 fl. oz. Each
Title: Bad product

So I tried the next best thing, ordering from Amazon.  The shampoo is AWFUL.  There is no way this is the same shampoo I bought from Walmart.  It makes my hair look so stringy and greasy, that I have to put dry shampoo in my hair to make it look like I actually washed it.  I gave this bottle three tries, and it’s a major fail.  DO NOT BUY!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: VERY nice.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Very nice
Review: I got turned on to this shampoo through the YouTube channel Curly Penny who I started watching recently. I must say that I love it. A little goes a long way and my hair feels very clean after scrubbing with this. If you use too much...it can be a tad drying. I will continue using until I can find a more "slippy" shampoo.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I truly can't find anything I dislike about this shampoo.  I only wish I'd tried it a long time ago.  When I was a teenager,  I didn't think a lot about what was in,  or not in,  my shampoo.  I know better now!  This shampoo smells great.  It has this fresh coconut smell that lasts for days.  Yes,  I was being lazy and didn't wash my hair for four (4) days but,  crazy enough,  my hair still smelled nice and it wasn't as dirty looking as would have if I'd used another shampoo.  Yes,  I was impressed.  This shampoo does come with a conditioner and even a leave-in conditioner.  I thought I'd bought the regular conditioner along with the leave-in but,  I accidentally bought two shampoos instead of one shampoo and one conditioner.  That was okay because I gave my daughter the second shampoo and still had the leave-in conditioner.  What I ended up discovering was that even washing my hair in hard water,  my hair was still silky soft and I didn't need the conditioner.  My long hair,  which tangles easily,  was not as difficult to comb through like it was with previous shampoos I'd used.  And,  no frizz or static electricity that you can often get from not using conditioner.  I live in Arizona and the weather can be drying to your hair if you don't condition it.  I haven't had that problem and my hair feels great.  No doubt it's the 100% virgin coconut oil in it.  What's not in it is sulfates or parabens.  So I know this is a quality shampoo.  This is the only shampoo I'll buy now.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: smells good, good lather, hair feels dry after
Review: it smells good, it has a good lather and feels like my hair is really clean. But it makes my hair dry and squeaky.. maybe a little on the harsh side? Especially compared to other products. This is apparently silicone free, sulfate free, etc and seems good for curly hair but its squeaky clean and hair feels dry. Hair does not feel hydrated or healthy-- but just clean. Everybody's hair is different so it might work for you.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Weightless Hydration and Nourishment
Review: I have fine, thin hair, and this shampoo does an amazing job of nourishing my hair without weighing it down. I don't need to use a conditioner for soft, manageable results.  Love!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Chanpu
Review: Pero lastima que solo de muy pocas onsas ay noay del grande

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Bomb
Review: Most moisturizing shampoo I ever tried . I will keep this on deck

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: I am so impressed with this shampoo. My hair was incredibly damaged. I have straight hair of medium thickness that was abused beyond belief. I had it bleached and dyed blue for months and months, and my hair was literally snapping when touched.I tried all sorts. Expensive masks. Cheaper ones. Homemade ones. Nourishing shampoos, not shampooing... Everything. My hair still looked like crap.A few months after using this shampoo and my hair is completely different. I only use it three times a week and I have no need to condition afterwards. My hair is soft and shiny and I love love this shampoo.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: It does the job,but not much else. It is definitely a lot better than other drugstore sulfate free shampoos. It doesn't lather too much,and it doesn't dry out my scalp at all. It also gets rid of dry flakes pretty well.However,it doesn't smell very good. Actually,it doesnt smell like anything at all! I was surprised,but i guess it's better that way.I feel like is quite expensive in the UK,so i would recommand if you're looking for a relatively consistent shampoo for curly hair. You're better off getting cheaper otherwise.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: I ordered this because i already had a conditioner which was perfect and why i went for the shampoo. When shampoo arrived and i opened it first thing i noticed it didn't smell the same. Had no scent at all but soapy smell.Also came damaged so i was already missing 2cm if shampoo in my bottle. The seal was stuck to the top. I will not bother with this brand anymore at all. I still tried it out.. but once i dried my hair. My hair felt like it was soaked in wax. I had to rewash my hair with different shampoo. Very dissapointed

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: It's hard to find a curly hair friendly shampoo but this is it sis.  Very little becomes very sudsy so you can clean more hair with less product. The smell is out of this world! And the hair is left clean and ready for your hair masque. Can be drying so DO NOT use this more than twice a week.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Nice shampoo but I had an order of these cancelled and then they put the price up about 30%! Will not be buying again.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Really awful stuff, tried it once and hated it and after a few months I tried to give it another chance but I just can’t get on with it. No nice scent and both times I’ve had to re wash my hair with another product because it hasn’t felt properly washed. Really disappointed considering the cost of the product.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse

Even with conditioner, once it's dry I have to comb argan oil through otherwise it feels brittle and tangly. I researched to see which shea moisture shampoo was suitable for my hair type (low porosity, fine, straight) and this was the one recommended- Pretty disappointed!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse

Title: Report abuse

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Es el primer champú sin sulfatos y siliconas que utilizo y la verdad que estoy encantada. Estos champús según tengo entendido suelen hacer muy poca espuma (debido a sus ingredientes) y dejar el pelo seco, pero este en concreto no.Hace la espuma suficiente como para saber si has lavado bien o no el pelo. Además he de añadir que en mi caso no me ha resecado el pelo en absoluto, ¡lo noto muy sano!, estaba teniendo problemas horrososos con la escamación, pero desde el primer lavado he notado una diferencia brutal, a los 3 días usándolo ya no tenía nada.Sin duda lo recomiendo 100%, aunque si no estás dispuesto a darle el tiempo necesario de adaptación quizá no sea el más indicado para ti.Pd. ¡Ojo, que si utilizas el champú sin sulfatos, etc. y a continuación (o antes) usas otros productos (mascarillas, acondicionadores, etc.) que sí los llevan no te va a ser de mucho!

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Me encanta esta marca, pero en esta ocasión el precinto venía abierto y el champú está aguado, lo sé porque ya lo he gastado en otras ocasiones.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: Malgré les commentaires concernant un certain rendu gras, j'ai quand même voulu tenter car j'ai les cheveux bouclés plutôt secs. Mais en effet, après ma première utilisation, un film gras désagréable était sur tous mes cheveux. Par contre, le point positif côté visuel : les cheveux n'ont pas l'air gras mais plutôt brillant et soyeux. Je lui ai laissé sa chance au produit pendants 3 lavages mais je ne peux plus supporter le toucher de mes cheveux. Je ne vais quand même pas jeter ce shampoing, je vais voir si je peux faire des mélanges pour atténuer un peu l'effet.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse
Review: A pesar de no tener sulfatos (lo cual es muy bueno) hace algo de espuma y es fácil de repartir por el pelo. Limpia muy bien y en conjunto con un acondicionador deja el pelo bastante bien. Es un producto caro pero como en el mercado español es difícil encontrar marcas sin parabenos, siliconas y sobre todo, sulfatos, esta es muy buena opción.

Product: Sheamoisture Daily Hydration Shampoo for All Hair Types 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Sulfate-Free 13 oz
Title: Report abuse

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Great product for thin-ish curly hair
Review: Only discovered Shea Moisture a year ago, but just LOVE this leave-in conditioner.  I spritz it on after toweling my hair off, and voila - no tangles!  And with thin-ish naturally curly hair, it does NOT weigh it down.  On my 2nd bottle already.  Also, I use on dry hair and then "scrunch" for more defined curls.  love this stuff!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: One of my go-to CG products.
Review: Part of my daily routine for sulfate, silicon, and paraben free curls. I've been using Shea Moisture products for about a year and a half, now, and every one of them has been a hit in different ways. This leave-in has great nourishment and good slip, and substantially reduces frizz. It's also lightweight enough that there's really no such thing as too much AS LONG AS YOU APPLY IT TO WET HAIR. I'd say this is probably a great base for any curl routine, but I can only speak from experience that it works wonders for my 3A/3B curl pattern.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Little goes a very long way!
Review: My cousin introduced me to this product.  I have naturally curly hair and now in my 50's I have found a product that works very well.  You do NOT need to use much.  Just put a very small amount in your palms, rub together and scrunch up on the curls.  I do not put it on my roots.  A little goes a very long way.  I will def be purchasing this product ONLY for my hair going forward.  Thank you for coming up with a product that isn't stiff, smelly, or heavy!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Beautiful Smell and Works Amazingly!
Review: Amazing!! This stuff does all that it says it will do! My thin hair feels soft, light, and isn’t weighed down at all by this product.  Another plus is the smell.  It’s not too strong but the coconut scent is definitely there.  I’ve noticed when I’m in a pool or if I get my hair wet again, the smell seems to come off lightly if I have used it earlier in the day, which I like.Also, I have sensitive skin and some hair products will cause me to breakout on my back where my hair touches or around my face.  I have been using this for a couple weeks now and there have been no breakouts in those areas!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Good leave in product for my thin curly/wavy hair.
Review: I use this when my hair is damp, and it seems to hold my curls together without any other products.  My hair is thin and when I put it on my hair from about 4 inches from my scalp on down, it works well.  If I get it on  or near my scalp, it looks greasy and my hair is weighed down, which is probably just MY hair.  I'll be reordering!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Oh My goodness
Review: I have finally found the leave in treatment that I have been looking for.  This makes my hair so soft and manageable.  I thought I was going to go broke looking.  I can stop my search now.  Thank you Shea Moisture.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: I usually love Shea moisture products
Review: I usually love Shea moisture products. But this spray is strong and is irritating to the eyes and nose. I have no idea what it's supposed to do for the hair. I don't see any benefits to my hair.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Soften, thickens and strengthens my hair.
Review: I use this product ever day. It’s amazing at softening, thickening and strengthening my hair. When  I used it for the first time I saw immediate results. After about a week I was totally taken by the results. Before I started using it my hair was breaking and thinning. I’m truly amazed.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Must buy for cozily naturals
Review: I wear my hair in a wash n go 99% of the time. This is my daily go to refresher spray. I'm on my 3rd full size bottle and it smells amazing and leaves my hair extremely moisturized.  Prior to using this product,  I had a lot of breakage and shedding.  This reduced it by at least 75%. Great product,  please don't change the ingredients.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Lovely Smell, Soft Strands Without Silicone
Review: When used right, it's great. Hair is soft and smells really nice, like coconut AND flowers. May purchase again, but I like this brand, so I might play with their other leave-ins before I settle on one I like.It MUST be used while all of the hair is still at least quite damp. I have long, porous hair, with ends that dry much faster than the rest of my hair, and at first I waited until most of my hair was damp, which meant my ends were already dry and the product sat heavily on top of the area that needed it to sink in the most. I know many people with long hair have this multiple-porisity issue, so if you do, use the product while the ends are damp and the rest of your hair is a little more wet.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Very hydrating, light, perfect for fine curls
Review: I've been looking for a great leave in conditioner with natural ingredients and Shea Moisture came thru!!! I'm Latina and white with fine but very dense 3a-b hair. This stuff is lightweight and very hydrating, and although the bottle is small and I used it liberally it actually lasts a long time. This stuff is very milky and not exactly thick or creamy. It won't weigh your hair down but provides moisture and a good base for your other products. This line is great for hair that is dry, fine, or prone to buildup. Would buy again.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Funky smell is NOT coconut, too much weight in my hair
Review: I am in the beginning of my CGM journey with 2c/3a hair and saw all the great reviews. The scent was nasty- like stale musty funk. I added some coconut essential oil and drops of vanilla and that made it somewhat more palatable.But the conditioner weighed down my hair, didn't help with frizz and was too heavy of a moisturizer for my curls.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Absolutely Love this Product
Review: I discovered the leave-in conditioner spray and the gel styler at CVS last summer while waiting in the checkout line - I bought the travel size bottles and fell in love but never got around to buying the full size until a week ago. I love the leave-in conditioner because I can spritz my hair and twist at night before bed. It keeps my hair moisturized and soft which works for me right now!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Received Possible Used Product
Review: Received what appears to be used product. The cap is missing, the product is not full, and the pump was already primed as if used. Really need the product now, but scared to use. Was not even wrapped in plastic like all other hair products I’ve received. Will likely return.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: My hair can curl again!
Review: My dry, bleached, damaged hair lost all its curl years ago. Using this product has brought my curls back and I couldnt be happier!

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Don’t buy.
Review: This product is not at all what I thought it would be. Immediately after using, my hair felt extremely dry and brittle. I can hardly run my fingers through it without it feeling like it’s going to break off. Mind you, this is right after washing and combing so my hair was 100% tangle free... until I used this. My ends don’t feel moisturized whatsoever. I’ve used it twice now, in hopes it would be better the second time around but I was so wrong. I also can’t help but notice how watered down it seems. Maybe it’s a knock off, I don’t know. I wouldn’t bother buying this product though. In my opinion, it’s not worth the money. I would return it but it’s just not even worth the hassle. Overall, save your money and find something else:

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: I like it.

I don't want something I feel like it heavy product and I have to wash it out of my hair every night. The smell is pleasant and it's perfect for the both of us as a base to our hair care routine.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Works wonders for frizzy curly hair
Review: I have tried so many products to keep my hair from being frizzy and to keep my curls all day.  I finally found this stuff, and it is so light, detangles, and makes my long hair soft, and keeps curls.  Other products often either leave my curls hard and crunchy or wet looking or is too heavy.  I absolutely love this stuff.  I gave it 5 stars because of the product itself.  However, I have to say I wish there was another way to get the product onto my hair.  The spray bottle is difficult to keep pumping over and over (for my long hair).  I have tried taking the pump off and putting it into my palm to rub it in, but this product is thin and liquid to go through the pump it's hard to do it that way.  Hoping they have a product that is a little thicker to apply easier.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: I have used this product before and it works great. However when I ordered this I didn’t receive ...

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Overwhelming Artificial Smell
Review: Used this once and once only as the scent was so overwhelming that it nearly made me sick, and I don't react to many products nor do I have any allergies. Sprayed my hair lightly the evening I bought it, but couldn't go so sleep with this scent on my hair as it provoked a headache. Awful, awful smell and so artificial. Not at all like a lovely coconut scent. So disappointed and returning today.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Lovely Surprise!
Review: I purchased this product on a whim at a beauty supply store after reading the ingredients; was impressed that none of the harmful to fragile hair ingredients were in this product. When I began unpacking my items, out of curiosity (I had my suspicions), I opened it up and the smell was lovely, I sprayed a small amount into my hair and immediately my hair became very soft an manageable. Then I tried it in a couple of my grandsons hair and it easily loosened up that thick tough to get through tangle. So I recently ordered a couple more on amazon because I know that I will need extra for the household, then I can keep mine away from everyone else.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Not for fine hair
Review: I was sad to find out my favorite leave in conditioner is full of parabens and other toxic ingredients.  I bought this because the ingredients are safe.  But I have baby fine thin blonde hair and this made my hair feel like straw.  It smells good but makes my hair tangled and gross.  It weighs my fine hair down.  I hope I can find a non toxic leave in product  that works for my hair type, but this is not it.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Horrible Product
Review: The only thing I liked about this product was the smell. Other than that it will ruin your hair. My daughter followed the directions and did as she was supposed to and we almost had to cut half of her hair off. We were going to have to cut it above her shoulders and her hair reaches to the middle of her back. It makes your hair greasy. I would definitely NOT recommend this, if you want to keep your hair nice and long. I'm going to return this terrible product. And when it got delivered and we took it out of the box it wasn't even packaged and it wasn't closed properly, so it started leaking.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: I wish I knew it wasn’t really for all hair types
Review: I wish this wasn’t touted as “for all hair types.” I have low porosity 2b hair & it is too greasy for me. Even just a little makes my freshly washed hair look like second or third day hair. And it is still not frizz free. Strange.It wasn’t until I learned that I have low porosity hair that it made sense to me (being oil spray & all). I imagine there are other folks like me out there who are just learning all the ins & outs of this stuff, and who could also be misled by the all hair types label.I so wanted to like this because most detangling sprays have terrible ingredients! :-( But the search continues).

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Didn't do anything for my frizz
Review: This leave-in product was recommended to me by a woman who has amazing curls - I have naturally curly hair, so I asked her what product she used.  I was excited when she said she got this at the local grocery store.Sadly, this product was disappointing.  Despite its boast that it has frizz control, my hair remained frizzy.  Other (cheaper) products have no problem controlling my frizz.Also, while there is a coconut scent, there is also a heavy perfume scent overlaying it  Some people like perfume smells - I do not, would prefer coconut.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: LOVE IT
Review: I love that I can spray this in my hair and keep it pushing in between the days I have to put a creme leave in conditioner in. I have 3C hair and it doesn't weigh. The only thing about this spritz is that I loathe the spritz part. It's hard to spritz with one finger when it gets all slippery. I like to grip. So I'll have to place the liquid in a spray bottle.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: HEAVENLY SCENT!!  LOVE THIS STUFF!!  DETANGLES BEAUTIFULLY! SILICONE-FREE!!
Review: REJOICE! I LOVE THIS STUFF!!  It smells so amazingly good!  And if you have tangly fly away hair, this stuff will HELP YOU!  Lightly mist before combing that tangly mess, and if you get a knot in your hair after washing plaster it with this stuff and work with your fingers to try to untangle the knot, you just might rescue the whole clump of hair...  very gently use your comb at the bottom end of your hair below the knot to try to keep straightening out the knot while working with your fingers and spray try to separate the knotted hair... I have had excellent results with my tangly hair, and if you end up spraying too much in your hair it can get noticeable but if it saves you from ripping your hair out, I say its worth it!  On the other days when I don't get a knot or tangle, I just lightly mist it on the ends to keep them in control and you don't notice it at all... the scent stays lovely all day... and it doesn't way your hair down when used lightly.  LOVE THIS PRODUCT AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!  This is SILICONE-FREE  Thank goodness because I break out and have rashes with all those silicone products out there.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: it's pretty think so most products I have to use a ...
Review: I use this spray almost daily. I have naturally curly hair, it's pretty thick so most products I have to use a lot to do little work. But since using this spray i noticed a little works well. This defiantly works to get rid of fizzy hair.

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Makes hair dull and smell is overpowering.
Review: I have naturally fine and wavy hair and this weighed down my hair and made it straight and DULL. It looked so unhealthy after spraying on wet hair. The aerosol is too fine and gets in your nose everytime, and the smell is way too strong. I love other Shea Moisture products but cannot recommend this one.

Review: I have 4a/4b hair. I use it on dry hair or wet hair ... coiled, stretched, curly ... doesnt matter! This is the truth and I will never be without it!

Title: Great oil spray to rejuvinate crisp/hard hair!
Review: heads up, i didnt buy this from amazon ~This stuff is amazing, i use it in my twist outs (4b hair). My hair absolutely LOVES this stuff, it makes it a lot more plush and moisture-retaining. and as the week goes by, when my hair starts to dry out and get "crispy," i just do a little spritz around my hair, and it makes it just as soft as day 1.Definitely would recommend, and this bottle looks like itll last a long time.

Title: Report abuse

Product: Shea Moisture 100% Virgin Coconut Oil Leave-in Treatment, Shine Curly and Tame Frizz for Tangle-Free Hair, All Natural certified Organic, 8 Ounce
Title: Report abuse
Review: Io ho i capelli 4b - 4c. Sono mulata. I miei capelli sono rovinati a causa dei vari trattamenti fatti negli anni. Attualmente sono in transizione (meta con relaxer e l'altra no). Si rompono e sembra che non crescano mai. Sono secchi con doppie punte. Devo lavarli ogni 3/4 giorni altrimenti inizio ad avere prurito e un po' di forfora. Questo prodotto credo non vada bene per me. Lho usato su capelli bagnati, asciutti, pre styling ma nessun beneficio. Anzì, devo dire che se usavo troppo prodotto, vedevo i capelli opachi dopo. Non mi sono trovata bene.
